host_about: Athens Quality Apartments is a company started back at 2007 and now we have 8 apartments. Our goal is to offer to travelers beautiful apartments with professional service only in good location and with all the necessary amenities.

Hey guys and many thanks for visiting my profile. I was born in Athens and I really love this amazing city. This is the main reason I bought and renovated 2 apartments, right in the most central part of the city. Having travelled a lot as well, I find that the interaction with the locals always gives you the right tips and makes the difference in the discovery of a new place. A tip: if you want "feel" a new city, first place to visit is the local outdoor market.

I work for one of Greece's major Charter Company.
I am sailor, love offshore sailing.
I have been "a live aboard" since 10 years.
I am Canadian, lived in France most of my adult live. 
The boat is in Greece, moving to different Islands.  
When you will be on board, the boat will not be moving.
I love cooking, great wine, people, places, stories, all music, opera, walking, swimming, and much more.
GUYS : Please, I am not looking for romance.
Kind, respectful, generous and giving

Hi everyone! My name is Stathis and I own Athens Direct Travel in Athens, Greece. My travel agency, among other services, manages vacation apartments in Athens and in Greece in general. In addition to the apts, Athens' Direct Travel Consultants can provide all travel services that guests might need, such as airport transfers, tours, boat tickets, etc. I hope to have the chance to host you and your family or friends in Greece!
Art. design and history addict.

Hello to all my profile visitors. I am an outgoing and friendly girl, I LOVE to travel and always take the best of the experience. That is why I choose cosy and family places to be accomodated in. My goal is to make you feel like home and contribute as much as I can during your experience in Athens!!! I would be really happy to host each one of you!
Hello! My name is Mika. You are welcomed to come and stay at my apartment in Athens! If you have any questions feel free to ask!

I was born in Athens and lived there until  I was 25. Then l lived on the beautiful island of Andros, a near- by island that was my vacation spot until 2004, when I decided that this was where I wanted to live permanently, away from the hustle and bustle of city life. During the summer months I work in a local hotel  as this is one of the best ways to meet people, especially travellers...  and who knows, maybe we will meet at some point in time... I also love travelling, meeting new people, learning new cultures  - and just seeing as much of the world as I can. As a traveller myself, I know what it means to have good accommodation, friendly hosts and good information.  So with this in mind I hope that I can fullfill all these requirements and ensure that your stay in Athens will be as you expecteded.
It will be my pleasure to do whatever I can to meet all your needs so that you return home with the best memories.
Hello!My name is Aris.I live in Athens.I love travelling all over the world and meeting interesting people.
Hello! My name is Manolis. You are welcomed to stay in my apartment under the rock of Acropolis! I am an architect and I like to discover cities all over the world!

Hi, I'm Nikos, living and working in Athens for almost all my life, except of a period when I was working for a multinational firm and been living and working in many European countries.

I am married to Kiriaki and we have 2 sons.

I own and manage many apartments in the very inner center circle of Athens (some of them beside the Metro, in 30-50m) and a few others in the larger Athens. 
All of them are either brand new or recently fully renovated. 
Depending on the apartment, they dispose free private Parking, extraordinary views of the city, Smart TVs, Satellite TV connection (1200 free channels), etc. They all beautifully decorated and dispose fully equipped (for long stays) kitchens, 42-50" LED TVs, Home Cinema, DVD collection, WiFi internet, A/C in all rooms, outdoor space (terrace, balcony, patio).
 
What I love mostly in my work is to meet different people & cultures from all over the world and to share our experience of life. 
What a wonderful feeling is when my guests thank me after having spent some unforgettable time in one of my apartments in this great city - Athens.
I wouldn't exchange this for the world.

I'll be very happy to host you in one of my apartments and provide you with all necessary information and tips on what you "must see", where and how to go, where to eat (and where not...!!) and so make your life easy and save a lot of your vacation time.

I can organize your transports inside/out of Athens (with VIP vehicles), starting from your pick-up from/to the airport, then a tour around the sites of Athens or a short daily escape to the larger Attica or your trip to Delphi, Mycenae, Epidaurus, Ancient Olympia, etc. 

Don't hesitate to contact me for further (Website hidden by Airbnb) charge...!!).

Hi, i'm an ex communications professional turned certified pilates instructor and home pilates studio owner.  Originally from Greece, I've lived in London for many many years, a lot less in Brussels and Luxembourg and now i'm settled in Paris, France with my husband, dog and 2 sons. 

Athens is my hometown (go check my lovely studio for rent situated in the best street of the city centre) and Zakynthos (Zante) is where my grandmother and grandfather originally grew up before they moved to Athens in theirs 30's (go check this lovely cottage house that can host up to 8 people). 

Thanks for reading my profile!

Our philosophy is “ service with style”.

A casual, intimate and friendly house offers superior accommodation for the discerning guest.

We offer the amenities you need and the luxuries you desire in a private setting.
 Our goal is to make your stay in Athens the most enjoyable and memorable possible.
 
We can meet all of your requirements or questions, if you have any, during your stay.
Our home offers impeccably clean rooms with many facilities, along with plenty of hospitality and friendliness.
 
Welcome to our home!

I'm a 30 year old freelance journalist/writer/translator dividing my time between Athens and Paris.
I love travelling, swimming, music and films.
I am an architect. I love music, ballet, arts and traveling. My hobbies are sailing, windsurfing and organic farming. I play the guitar and piano.

Our company offers fully furnished apartments for residential use only. 
We own, sublease and manage a variety of apartments, catering to different styles, sizes, interior, for the right kind of budget.  The collection for such apartments is within the Athens City Centre, within walking distance from major city sites and close to public transport when arriving from or heading to the airport or Piraeus port.

I was born in Walnut Creek, Ca USA. I am practicing Meditation and also teach TM. I also am involved in my own business, Janu Gems, wholesaling beads, pearls and loose gemstones. This keeps me busy traveling to places like India, Greece, Cyprus, Hong Kong, Bangkok and USA. 
My wife Reshma is from Allahabad,  India and comes from a family of musicians. She is very talented and is performing concerts on the Sitar in many countries. We have two children who are multicultural and are a joy to watch and be with as they grow and develop in so many ways.
We are vegetarians and do not smoke, drink or gamble. Our interests include Ayur Veda, Vedic Astrology, Sciences and Arts among other things. Music is a part of our everyday life and travels.

HELLO TRAVELLERS!
I AM AN OUTGOING PERSON  THAT HAS DONE A LOT OF TRAVELLING,SO I KNOW HOW IMPOTRANT IT IS WHILE TRAVELLING TO A FOREIGN COUNTRY TO BE ABLE TO STAY AT A PLEASANT ENVIRONMENT AND TO FEEL THAT YOU HAVE SOME FRIENDS AWAY FROM HOME.
I AM HERE TO MAKE YOUR STAY AS ENJOYABLE AS POSSIBLE AND TO MAKE GREAT SUGGESTIONS. I ENJOY TRAVELLING,ENGAGGING IN DIFFERENT CUISINES,DRINKING FINE WINE READIND WATCHING FILMS LISTENING TO MUSIC AND IN GENERAL ENJOYING LIFE! I CANNOT WAIT TO MEET NEW PEOPLE!

Hello there. I love to watch football and i like to travel. I traveled all over europe and north and south america to watch football games. I like to stay at apartments like the one i am renting in airbnb. I feel that life is to short not to enjoy it!!!!!!!!!!!

We at Boutique Athens offer accommodation to travellers who are interested in the cultural and artistic pursuits on offer in our amazing city, Athens.
We own and manage several fully serviced, high quality apartments in the centre of the city.
We are interested in food, art, modern history and what is new and exciting.
We personally meet and greet our guests.
We provide full kitchens for cooking, a wonderful art collection and many books on Modern Greece.

Hello! My name is Agis.

My philosophy is "Be a traveler, not a tourist!"

I enjoy traveling around the world, stay in 5 stars quality hotels and properties and learn about other cultures. 

You are most welcomed to come and stay in my unique and exclusive Suites in Athens! 

I consider each one of you as my guests and not customers. I will be very happy to give you recommendations during your stay, in order to feel "local". And of course to support you when you are exploring Athens.

I run a Short term Rentals' agency since 2007 and I've learned a lot all these years, from experiences, as well as mistakes! 

We specialize in all-inclusive rentals of high-quality apartments and houses in Greece, for a stylish, personalized hotel alternative.

I enjoy carefully selecting furnished, equipped apartments & studios, intended for a short city break or for a longer corporate stay in the very heart of Athens.
I also take pride in hand-picking unique traditional Cycladic residences, ideal for experiencing the simplicity of a genuine home in a small island, like Sifnos.

Bottom line: I love my job! I hope you'll love our properties too :-)

I live in Athens! Spent last years in London, New York and all over Italy. I ve been an artist since the day I remember myself. I work as a theatre director and a performer. I love interior design, european literature and jazz music. I spend my rare day-offs with friends and family. Enjoy meeting new people and cultures. So be my guest!
Our company rents apartments on short or long term lease in the centre of Athens. We aim to provide a professional service to our guests and offer a comfortable and  pleasant stay.

I have travelled a lot for business and leisure and I can appreciate genuine hospitality.I love people who have the natural curiosity to explore other countries and I would be pleased to offer them an opportunity to relax and enjoy themselves.

I am a young architect sharing time between Athens and Xylokastro (a town by the sea at, 120km from Athens). Apart from my job, my interents are dancing tango, travelling, music, photography.
I love Athens and take great pleasure in hosting people at my apartment, giving them tips about where to go, what to see, propose places of interest etc.

Hello!  My name is Foris.  I'm  from the beautiful island of Cyprus. I am a pro athlete of the Cypriot national team, in distance running. I have also attended the national university of Athens in primary education department. I love running and traveling. My favorite travel destination except Cyprus, is Kenya! I like good food, and anything  traditional to each country. I always take care of my hosts, so don't worry. Just make your reservation and I will take care of the rest!

Nowadays, I am using my airbnb income to fulfill my childhood dream of participating in the olympic games, specifically to fund my preparation for the Tokyo 2020.
I am passionate with art and I like hosting new people in my fantastic view apartment in Athens. I like travelling in Europe so you might meet me as a guest either as a host :-)

Hello!! My name is Jenny and I live in Athens, Greece. I love to meet interesting people and make them feel at home. 
My life motto: Try to be positive, life is too short and precious for negativity! Smile is contagious!!  :-)

Having grown up in the heart of Europe, Brussels, made me love the sharing of experiences and customs of different cultures and Airbnb is a great place to do just that!

Whenever I travel, Airbnb is the first place I look since you not only get better deals, but you also get the opportunity to learn about the insights of the city and take advantage of the warm welcome from the local people, which is not always the case through the impersonal character often experienced in hotels.

As a host I want to share with my guests the same experience I would like to have as a traveller. Together with my brother, George, we look forward to making your experience in Athens unforgettable!

Twenty two apartments in the center of Athens, designed for the traveler that wants to explore the city and live like the locals. 
“Handmade”, fully equipped, value-for-money, contemporary touch, classic attire, next to everything you will ever need. Every apartment is unique and you can check out the one that meets your needs .
Andreas, Andonis, Vassilis and Varnavas, the creators of Live in Athens,  and the rest of our team, are here to guide you in our city and provide extra comfort and true care during your stay. 
Whether you are looking for a second to none vegetarian restaurant, small galleries, “happening tonight” events, or the best place to see the sunrise in Athens, give us a shout and one of us will be happy to make the suggestions you are looking for!

Come stay with us, come Live in Athens!

AthenStyle - rooms and studio flats in the heart of Athens! Located in AthenStyle building, enjoy advantages of a 24-hour reception, breakfast for a small fee and housekeeping services as well as the privacy of your own apartment! ...and easily one of the best views in Athens from the 360 Rooftop Bar. Just beneath the Acropolis, in the historical area of Monastiraki / Psirri, within a walking distance to all the most important archeological sites and monuments, in the middle of Athens' action! ;-)
Hello!My name is Dimitrios.I am 32 years.I am industrial designer based in Athens.If you have any questions feel free to ask me!
Hello!My name is Rania.I am a friendly and calm person.I love travelling all over the world.

Dear Travelers
Welcome to our city, thank you for choosing our apartment for your stay. My wife Ifigenia and I, wish you a beautiful holiday in our city. I am an architect and art photographer. I have studied architecture at the University of Florence in Italy. Ifigenia is a painter of Byzantine icons. We like to meet personally our quests and assist them during the staying.
Have a great vacation
Yiagos Ifigenia
In summary, our philosophy states itself in a simple way: to provide top accommodation with artistic design apartments including many amenities and privacy right in the heart of Athens.
Hi! My name is Marilia! I'm from Athens and I'm interested on environmental matters. I also enjoy music, travelling, yoga and dancing. Feel free to contact me for any questions!

I am a Mechanical Engineer with a M.Sc. degree from the Royal Technical University in Stockholm. 
I have been living in Sweden for approx. 15 years but I have been living with my family in Athens,   
the latest 20 years. 

Besides my work, I like being with friends, travelling, meeting new people, visiting new places, listening to music ...   

I cannot live without my 4 children and my wife ...

My moto is :
- Be honest
- Be emotionally generous 
- Be human
- Enjoy life

Who would have thought when I boarded a plane for Greece more than 20 years ago, planning on backpacking through the mountains and then heading north through then Yugoslavia I'd end up making Greece my second home?
But here I am, 20 something years later, running a fabulous Greek vacation rental business with historic homes & penthouses in Athens, planning Greek travel itineraries and leading small group food & wine focused tours around my adopted homeland and loving the life that I am lucky enough to be living. Of course I did pick up an equally crazy, workaholic Greek husband along the way, as well as a stray Greek animal or two!

Update: End of November 2017 .... This year Basil and I celebrate 15 years opening our Greek vacation rentals to guests from around the world. All these years we've been hopping between Basil's home city, Athens and Carole's home city of Chicago.  Time and time again guests in Greece ask us if they can stay in our Chicago home while we're in Athens.... so we're finally doing it - we've just completed the renovation of a fab old factory with 3 vacation rentals called the Magic Factory Lofts. We've got 3 and 4 bedroom homes in the heart of the city with Big Shoulders -  in our hybrid warehouse (which in a previous life housed a bar and a dance hall, followed by a costume and magic card factory and then a photography studio where probably every Butterball turkey advertisement in the 1980s was shot .... the photos, not the turkeys!)

So come stay with us ... and then stay with us again. Whether we share an ouzo in Athens in our Acropolis View Alpha Plus penthouse or Sky Villa or a beer and a hot dog in Chicago, in our Magic Factory Lofts  we know that you won't be disappointed.

I was born in Graz, Austria and I am living in Athens Greece. Speaking English and of course Greek.I like to travel to take pictures from every place I visit and meeting new people and cultures.Just because I have lived in some european countries for some time (Austria and Great Britain) and travel a lot,  I know that the hospitality is the most important thing that travellers enjoy and like during their visit to a new country-culture. I am going to try and make you feel as cozy and as pleasant as I can during your stay at my apartment and my country. I will be happy to meet new people, so, see you in Greece :)

I love the simple things in life and I am not a party animal. I enjoy interesting conversations with friends or guests. I like to occupy myself with many hobbies: computers, internet, photography, nature, music (listening/playing), DIY, traveling, etc. 

I like to make my guests as comfortable as possible, and to provide them with hints and tips to make their stay in Greece more enjoyable. I like some cultural exchange with the guests whenever possible. I have even made some good friends via airbnb.

Hello my airbnb friends! I am a half Greek, half german born and bred in Athens , in my thirties and a down town city girl .I am a speech therapist working with children . I love to dance , to eat , to decorate and organize. I have many tips for the city of Athens , daily secrets that can make your stay a beautiful memory .I have personally decorated my apartments with  great care and my personal taste . I hope to have the chance to accommodate you and that your stay in Athens will be unforgettable .

My name is Labis, 43, married, electrical engineer and consider myself philoxenos (= disposed to treat guests with warmth and generosity is the remark of the dictionary). Currently I am developing Trading Robots.
Hi! My name is Efi and I would like to welcome you to my cosy apartments, that i designed and decorated on my own, in the center of Athens, near Acropolis!

THIS IS MY PERSONAL SUMMER HOME  TO LET WHEN I AM AWAY


MANAGER OF MY CO , INTERESTED IN SCUBA AND SAILING
English guy, have travelled all over the world but Athens is my favourite city
Hello! My name is Yannis. You are welcomed to come and stay at my apartment in Athens , Greece . If you have any questions feel free to ask!
Hi all! The only investment I haven't regret in my life is traveling and meeting people!  From June 1st 2020  I am  hosting again with safety :)

Artistic and Vibrant Individual. Open minded and a great host.
Looking forward to making your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We are both architects,. Like good music, books, art, theater, movies and good food. Interesting in cooking. We are keep moving among Athens,  Astros and Alexandroupolis.
Amateur dancers (ballroom, latin).
Like traveling and knowing other places, especially with car.
Interesting in knowing people from other countries. We have listings, in Athens centre , in Astros - Peloponnese by the sea and  Alexandroupolis. We try our guests to be as comfortable as we would also like to be when traveling. So, we are happy as all our guests are satisfied till now.

I was born and raised in Athens. I have lived, studied and worked in the USA for several years. My love for travel and my experience as a host has earned me 27 consecutive times the superhost status.
My guests get to experience the Greek hospitality in a more contemporary way. Really glad to meet travelers from every corner of the world.

Welcome in my profile on Airbnb! Infos about our house, the transportation and the neighborhood are already in the listing. In case of any further question please feel free to contact me before booking. Some introduction about you and your guests, is really appreciated.

Dear Traveler,

I've been an active member of the Airbnb Community for quite some time and have thankfully acquired lots of experience in hosting people. 

My character is that of an open-minded person who inquires into life with a philosophical touch while following my desires in a pretty straightforward way.  

Enjoy your stay in Athens. :)

Hi , my name is Elpidoforos which can be translated from Greek as "the one who bares hope. I  actually find it difficult to live up to the meaning of my name, but I really am doing my best. Most people just call me Doros for short - which, by the way, means "gift" or "present" in Greek. 

I was brought up in Athens and I have lived here, practically all my life. My studies in Sociology and Marketing, as well as my previous work experience - which included direct sales - provided me with a thorough understanding of social  behavior and how this is affected by cultural and other factors. 

I was working as a travel agent for seven years, mainly as an outgoing tour operator for Middle East countries - til 2011 when riots broke out in Syria, which was our main destination. I've been to Syria, Jordan and Lebanon more that 10 times as a tour leader and this was, without doubt  a very important experience in my life. 

My hobbies include playing bass, going to the movies and to the theatre and going to concerts.

One of the things I enjoy most in life is meeting people from different countries and cultural backrounds. This is one of the reasons why I singed up to Airbnb.
I strongly believe that I can relate to very different types of people and help them experience Greek hospitality in a more contemporary fashion.

I am really looking forward to meeting as many travelers as I can and will do my best to be the best host I can be.

I am a happy girl that Iikes to meet new persons from all over the world.
I like to walk ,to travel a lot, be with friends.
I feel my guests as my friends  and I  wish that they have a wonderful stay.

Ready to travel in a sort notice !!!
Ηθοποιός - Αγρότισσα - Εμψυχώτρια Θεατρικού Παιχνιδιού - Χειμερινή κολυμβήτρια ...

Je suis architect d interieur,J ai fait mes etudes a Paris ou jai vecu pendant 5 ans.La creativite est mon passion et l autre c est le bateau a voile J adore voyager dans la mer Egee et Ionienne ou alors en avion,train voiture n importe quoi.Je vois la beaute meme la ou les autres ne la voient pas,et j adore les enfants et les animaux (j en ai 5)J adore la litterature ancienne greque, francaise ,chinoise  russe etc.J aime bien me ballader dans les rues inconnues d une ville,voir comment les habitants vivent,parler avec eux.Pour moi les voyages sont des voyages d esprit et d ame.J aimerais aussi partager mon amour pour Athenes avec mes hotes.Leur indiquer des endroits pas marques sur les cartes.
Hello! My name is Emily. If you want to be in the heart of Athens look no further!! You are welcomed to come and stay at my apartment in Athens. If you have any questions feel free to ask!

I have an art gallery-  I am very friendly and helpful and can provide you with maps directions, internet connection, fresh towels smelly soaps, toothbrush and toothpaste- hair dryer, something extra you may need that you forgot to bring with you we can provide- my space is a  3 min walk from metro station - I have lived in Paris for 10 years spoiled from the beauty of that city- i speak french and english italian and and communicate in spanish. I can give you tips on what to do in the city and insiders information - I run an art gallery that is located right in front of the house  that you will enjoy visiting. 
Things I like a lot- children, gardens, flowers, politeness, kindness, humour, cyclists, yoga, exercising...I love travelling to India, Paris, New York, favourite books include Tolstoy, Murakami, Moravia, music - Cat Power, Lou Reed, David Bowie, Madonna, Bach, And Food I prefer fresh healthy stuff with no pesticides and chemicals - Love sardines and avocado!
I have a motto- The ocean is made of drops so dont think you cannot make a difference!

the city trying to recreate beauty in my own space

I love bicycles and cycling I think it makes a city happier and cleaner - I like to exercise - am very clean and tidy and love to take care of my garden and plants - I can't live without travelling, reading books, swimming, - my favourite travel destinations so far are Paris, india, greek islands...

Having me as a guest would be no trouble because I think I would be out and about the whole day and you would probably not see me at all ! Having me as a host it depends what you would want if you need me I would be very helpfull and tell you all the insiders information about athens or if you like to be left alone I would not bother you in the least!

life moto

the ocean is made of drops 
you can make a differenc by being kind and helpful

My name is Miglen. My education is Profile ceramics, design and decoration and sculpture. I am funny and friendly. I like to travel and to create new friends, but also I work hardly. So ... this is me :)
Like to listen to and tell stories, to people, in cities. When in nature, I prefer to walk and swim.
i am a theatre director living in Athens and sometime in my island Zante that is why i can rent my apt which is rather cool during the summer. My apt has a small patio  it is a pet friendly apt

Με μία λέξη νομίζω ότι είμαι ο άνθρωπος της επικοινωνίας. Έχω σπουδάσει Δημόσιες Σχέσεις και τις ασκώ, έχω σπουδάσει υποκριτική και είμαι ενεργή ηθοποιός και όλες οι δουλειές που έκανα ή κάνω έχουν σχέση με την επικοινωνία. 
Αγαπώ το θέατρο, τη γυμναστική, τα ταξίδια και τα ζώα. Το τελευταίο μου ταξίδι ήταν στο Όσλο και το ερωτεύτηκα. Το τελευταίο βιβλίο που διάβασα είναι το Πάρα πολύ ευτυχία της Άλις Μονρό και ανακάλυψα έναν καινούριο κόσμο, αυτόν των διηγημάτων. Η τελευταία ταινία που είδα ήταν Ο υπνοτιστής, σουηδική και ήταν από τις καλύτερες ταινίες suspense που έχω δει.
We are a couple from Greece Hydra Island. . In case you need any further information for your stay with us, please feel free to contact me.

Hello I am Artemis. 
To guests: I have taken lots of care to make my apartments as welcoming and relaxing as possible so your stay will be unforgetable.
To hosts: I am careful and respectful of other people's homes and possesions as I would like my guests to be of mine.

My name is Athina Markantoni. I am a developing consultant and work on a free lance base as a consultant on EU projects.  I am Greek, a like classical music, modern furniture and design, good food, travel (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ΑΡΙΘΜΟΣ ΜΗΤΡΩΟΥ ΑΚΙΝΗΤΟΥ
I am an ex journalist, a playwright and Pilates instructor. I'm passionate about art, philosophy and my city.

Romanos & the straycats is one of a kind bnb team consisted by highly professionals administrators, welcome personnel & cleaners to offer you not merely a hassle-free comfortable stay in Athens or in luxury resorts in Greece, but also share with you tailor made tips & experiences out of our multifarious city or country depending your interests and mood.

With 16hours per day communication shifts and welcome person waiting for you at any destination and place, you may feel safe that travelling abroad is like visiting a place, where a good acquaintance can let you know the whereabouts and secret aspects of the culture you would like to explore.

If I have to say something about myself, I studied philosophy at Birkbeck College and I love music good to my ears as well as reading that treats well my mind and spirit, while a nice basketball game is always something I can't refuse to watch or participate. Air bnb allowed me to meet people from all over the world, which is nice as I feel I'm traveling inside my own city through their eyes and provide me a glimpse may be of their own places.

It would be our pleasure to host you at one of the places we administrate and trust straycats assist you to have a unique experience out of Greece.

Please don't hesitate to contact us and hope to see you in Athens soon. :)

Hi!
My name is Eleni  Leela. 
 I have  made studies in two opposed subjects.  Business Administration and Art and  Design.  However it was Art that won my heart and I am now working as an Art Critic and Painter (specialised on aquarelle on silk).
 I am always interested in a challenge. I like reading, yoga, swimming, travelling, dieting.   
I love psychology and the  study of various religions .  
I am fascinated by Hinduism but mostly by the Buddhist  philosophy which has influenced my way of living and travel often to India, Nepal and Tibet.  
It is wonderful to meet new people and talk about life.  I currently spare my time between Greece and The Netherlands where I make Art for the Museum of Contemporary Tibetan Art.  
It is wonderful that I had the possibility to be a host and being in contact with people around the world.

Πληροφορίες: Hello travellers! My name is Marinos and I am originally from Western greece from an island called lefkada , living in Athens .
Welcome to my profile on Airbnb! I am a hotelier and I would be very happy to host you in my listings in Athens and Lefkáda!! 

. I am a hotelier back in the island,as well as creating my own spaces for visitors in Athens Together with dimitra a colleague of mine  which is a villa's manager, We are   trusted persons  and would be great hostes  for anybody who wants to visit our places   !!.
We are new in airbnb but working in tourism over 15 years !

Native Athenian, I’m a jewellery designer and creative soul when not hosting on Airbnb, which I’ve been happily doing since 2017. I’m half Australian and spent many years living and working in London before coming back to my beloved hometown. I enjoy meeting new people from all over the globe and will gladly give you insider tips on the city and destinations in Greece. I love interior design as well as the outdoors and my absolute favourite is the greek island life! I look forward to making your stay pleasant and hassle-free!
Hello! My name is Dimitris. You are welcome to come and stay at my apartments in Athens, Greece! If you have any questions, feel free to ask!

We are Roula and Vassilis. We live on Chios Island. Since 2007 we run an ecotourism-related travel business offering activities, accommodation and travel advise to people visiting from all over the world. Our motto for the business on Chios is "to bring people in touch with the local culture" and we hope that airbnb will help us offer similar oportunities to those of you wishing to stay at our apartment in Athens. 

We love to travel and we have been to many places in Greece and abroad. Our favorite destinations in Greece are Chios (ok, we admit this is a bit biased) and Crete (the unspoilt part of the island). Our most memorable trips abroad were to  Syria, Tanzania, Paris, Prague.

Since 2012 our family has expanded. Our lovely twins were born in August of that year.

We expect to use the extra income by letting our apartment in Athens to improve the apartment, support the family and the busines on the Island.

We are really looking forward to hosting you!

I am from Athens, however I have very close ties with two beautiful Greek islands Santorini and Patmos.

As my father’s family is from Santorini I spent all my summers there. Since I am a licensed tour guide, in 2004 I decided to move to Santorini in order to work there. This was a great chance to start renovating my family’s properties in order to be able to share them with people from all over the world. 

In addition, many years ago, my mother visited the island of Patmos, fell in love with it and decided to buy two beautiful pieces of land, including very old farmhouses in ruinous condition, that she slowly renovated. In this way, our family and numerous friends enjoyed many unforgettable Patmos Easters and summers. Nowadays, I am responsible for the good condition of the houses that I rent out and share the beauty and special ambiance of this island with our guests.

I am very lucky since my twin daughters, Alexandra and Christina, having completed their studies abroad in hospitality management and tourism, returned to their roots in order to continue and develop what I started.  Genuine hospitality, love and respect for the island, as well as the embracement of the local culture define our core values. Nowadays we all share our time between Santorini, Patmos and Athens, and have the honor and pleasure to share our family’s story and our love for these islands, with visitors from all over the world. 

After many years in the hospitality industry, today I have the pleasure along with my daughters to embrace one more much loved island home, my husband's summer house on the island of Hydra. The house was built by my father in law 40 years ago. My husband Dimitris will be managing the house in Hydra.

My name is Stratis and I grew up in Athens. I have traveled extensively and lived in England, the US, Syria and Lebanon while studying Anthropology and History. 
I returned to Athens just when the financial crisis struck hard and I have found myself being involved in the Miaouli8 project. Miaouli8 is a collection of lofts and spaces situated in an industrial building built by my grandfather in the mid 1960s.
The listings that I am hosting are the outcome of an inventive effort to revive the unused spaces of the building. Using old family furniture, second hand vintage objects from flea markets and a lot of personal work, we have transformed these former craft spaces into modern Athenian apartments.

I am a person who has seen Greece through some of the best and the worst times. I have lived through WWII and the Civil War, democracy and the dictatorship, the drachma and the euro, the Olympics and the subsequent hardships. Throughout, I have maintained that Greece is paradise on earth, a wonderful welcoming oasis in the Mediterranean. Though it has changed considerably through the years, it still maintains a beauty that is unrivaled. Fabulous climate, a clear atmosphere, sparkling blue water, and an Acropolis which reminds us of where it all began. I am a citizen of the world but I remain deeply committed to a place that will surely feel special to all those who visit. Come armed with a camera and some wonderful Greek poetry (Seferis, Elytis, Homer). Walk around, open your mind and senses. Read a book. Turn off your electronic devices if but for a tiny bit and take in the sites, the sounds, the food, the essence of Greece.
I am a lawyer specialised in Public Law and energy issues. I am interested in Art and Literature. My favourite destinations are Paris and small Greek islands.

Hello! This is Christine and I am proud to say  that the renovation of this house was my first project as an architect in 1995.  The basement was a barn full of hens and chicken, which is not far away, from what it was, after the renovation took place, when our two children where babies. 
Now, Paris and Iris are in their twenties, a political scientist and a computer freak and I abandoned architecture to become a graphic designer. Together with Kostis, my husband, who in his free time is a marketing consultant, we run an advertising agency in Athens. We both enjoy to travel with a private jet, champagne and caviar, fast cars Ferrari  and Lamborghini, but we discover that spending our holidays in this house is much more relaxing. So I play with decoration, design, gardening and making marmalades and Kostis despite his natural talent for writing  is always with a hammer and a saw.
As you have well suspected, this text has been edited by him!

An apartment that has a spectacular view to the Temple of Zeus, Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill!
5 minutes walking distance from Acropolis, the New Acropolis Museum, Plaka, Syntagma square and the Panathenaic stadium where the first Olympic Games took place in 1896!

TopHouzzing’s story is simple yet exciting! We are Maria & Alex, the founders, both engineers. So we were already working together in the design & construction sector, so we  dealt with properties all the time. We are both into details, both love doing something right from scratch.

While we were traveling to new places and meeting old friends / making new ones, we felt what a rental should feel like, what it should offer guests like ourselves. Lots were missing, especially the simple little things that makes a visitor feel right at home -away from home. We then decided to start a rentals & real estate management company. It was July 2015 and we named it TopHouzzing Properties - the mission was simply to offer truly top accommodation to our guests. Starting then with a couple of our own properties, refurbished completely, we embarked on a great journey. 

Today the company manages close to 100 properties and growing steadily, mostly in Athens but also in mainland Greece and islands, flats, villas and so on. TopHouzzing  also offers consulting & real estate, design & construction and other professional services in its portfolio.

Hard work and our passion paid off. Our success is clearly stated not only in the many owners that trust us with their properties but even more in the hundreds 5-star reviews from guests from all over the world,  leading us to have a record of 14 consecutive quarters-since the company’s inception- SuperHost status on Airbnb!

We take very good care of our guests and so do we with owners. You see, we both think as guests & owners ourselves. We are waiting anxiously to host you or to manage your property, in both cases you are in good hands with us.

Hey my name is Chris
I ve been  host and traveler in Airbnb for about three and a half years now and we really enjoy what i do!
 Getting in touch with guests, interacting with people from all around the world, sharing stories were some of my first reasons we started hosting here!
After all the guests i have hosted we can say that being a host for someone means a lot and especially to us, greeks ,that we have the idea of hospitality  really high to our way of living! 
As a guest, its always nice to go somewhere and have someone to answer your questions and chat with them  instead of goin to a impersonal reception in a hotel lobby.
Airbnb is hard work and most of us who ve been here a long time know it really well!
 It’s a lot of work
Between the communication, setting up your spot, updating the cal, getting photos, laundry, cleaning, everything, it’s a lot of work. You typically don’t have a full time staff working for you, so this is all you most of the times. You are the business development team, the creative team, and most certainly the customer support team. If you do not perform at the highest level at each of these positions, you could see sales decrease. Thanks to the transparency of reviewing hosts and guests, if you mess up, everyone will know, and your business will suffer.
This is one of the reasons why I love Airbnb. You get rewarded for a job well done.

A very warm welcome from me, Theoharis, the owner of Vilaman ΙΚΕ, the property management company that is running this property.
Having traveled extensively in the Americas, SE Asia and Europe, and being a demanding traveller myself, I adapted my experiences to my native Greece and combined them with our philoxenia: the ancient greek word that literally means a “friend to a stranger” and is synonymous to hospitality. 
For Greeks however, it is something deeper than that., it is an unspoken cultural law that shows generosity and courtesy to strangers. 
In addition, my personal relationship with each property owner allows me to make sure that everything runs smoothly, as desired, so that our every guest feels at home at our properties and takes a unique experience and unforgettable memories back home with them.

Η γλώσσα κάνει τον άνθρωπο...
Die Sprache macht den Menschen erst zum Menschen... Αλλά και η φιλοξενεία κάνει τον άνθρωπο και η ευγένεια και η ανθρώπινη συμπεριφορά αλλά και  τα ταξίδια.
Είμαι η Εύα, είμαι καθηγήτρια Γερμανικών, διδάσκω επίσης Ελληνικά σε ξένους. Ζω και εργάζομαι από το 1989 στην Αθήνα την οποία αγαπάω πάρα πολύ και πιστεύω ότι όλοι οι άνθρωποι θα πρέπει να την επισκευτούν τουλάχιστον μία φορά στη ζωή τους. Πριν από το 1989 έζησα στην Κολωνία, στο Έσσεν, στις Βρυξέλλες, στο Παρίσι, στη Μαδρίτη, στη Μάλαγα. Ταξίδεψα στις Μαλδίβες, στην Σιγκαπούρη, στα Αραβικά Εμιτάτα, στην Αίγυπτο, στην Ταϊλάνδι, και σε πάρα πολλά ελληνικά νησιά.
Πιστεύω ότι τα ταξίδια, τα βιβλία, η μουσική, οι φίλοι και οι διανθρώπινες επαφές κάνουν την ζωή μας ομορφότερη! Χαίρομαι για τους ανθρώπους που μένει ακόμη να γνωρίσω. Δεν θα μπορούσα να ζήσω χωρίς τα ταξίδια, την μουσική, τα βιβλία, την αρχαία ελληνική τραγωδία και τα όνειρά μου! Τα αγαπημένα μου νησιά είναι η Σίφνος, η Πάτμος, η Λευκάδα, η Σκιάθος η Σκόπελος, η Πάρος και η Σαντορίνη. Το αγαπημένο μου βιβλίο είναι η Ασκητική του Νίκου Καζαντζάκη, ο αγαπημένος μου συνθέτης είναι ο Βίλα Λόμπος, η αγαπημένη μου ταινία είναι κάθε ταινία που μας κάνει καλύτερους και το αγαπημένο μου φαγητό είναι τα αιγαιοπελαγήτικα ψάρια με κάθε λογής χορταρικά, οι σαλάτες από την λατρεμένη ελληνική γη και το βιολογικό ελαιόλαδο της μαμάς μου. Καλή αντάμωση!

Hello, and thank you for your interest in our apartments. Whether it's a short or a long term stay, a house is a place which should provide comfort, security, and shelter for the hours we need to relax after a hard working (or maybe exciting as well) day.

As you set out for Ithaka
hope the voyage is a long one,
full of adventure, full of discovery.
Laistrygonians and Cyclops,
angry Poseidon—don’t be afraid of them:
you’ll never find things like that on your way
as long as you keep your thoughts raised high,
as long as a rare excitement
stirs your spirit and your body.
Laistrygonians and Cyclops,
wild Poseidon—you won’t encounter them
unless you bring them along inside your soul,
unless your soul sets them up in front of you.
 
Hope the voyage is a long one.
May there be many a summer morning when,
with what pleasure, what joy,
you come into harbors seen for the first time;
may you stop at Phoenician trading stations
to buy fine things,
mother of pearl and coral, amber and ebony,
sensual perfume of every kind—
as many sensual perfumes as you can;
and may you visit many Egyptian cities
to gather stores of knowledge from their scholars.
 
Keep Ithaka always in your mind.
Arriving there is what you are destined for.
But do not hurry the journey at all.
Better if it lasts for years,
so you are old by the time you reach the island,
wealthy with all you have gained on the way,
not expecting Ithaka to make you rich.
 
Ithaka gave you the marvelous journey.
Without her you would not have set out.
She has nothing left to give you now.
 
And if you find her poor, Ithaka won’t have fooled you.
Wise as you will have become, so full of experience,
you will have understood by then what these Ithakas mean. 

Ithaka-C. P. Cavafy (greek poetry)

I wish you a wonderful stay!

Best,

Athina

Welcome to homm®

The key to success in all our collaborations is that we undertake the complete management of your property/hotel at all stages, ensuring its perfect functionality 24/7 and providing high-end tools, aiming to increase your revenue without your participation.

1. homm®️ Management
homm® property / hotel management services covers the needs of the modern owner / hotelier, including sales and marketing strategies, operational structure and estimation of revenue-budget.

2. homm®️ Digital Sales Management
homm® provides the online sales management of your property / hotel, including all the major OTAs and the direct booking engine. We also analyse your competition and offer revenue and yield management, reporting and forecast, as well as the management of your reservations.

3. homm®️ Digital Marketing Management
Brand building or the rebranding of your property / hotel, homm® Marketing Services include the online and offline advertising, the construction of your website, the social media and reputation management.

4. homm®️ Hotel Operations Management
homm® operations management services ensure the perfect operation of your property, analysing and monitoring each hotel department (Reservations, Housekeeping) via our innovative mystery guest feature.

5. homm® Booking Platform
homm® has created its own booking platform for exclusive properties, hotels and villas in Greece.

Enjoy the benefits of homm® 45.000 direct clients data base.

All interested owners are able to register and upload their property, provided that it is fully renovated and meets all the necessary standards for hosting guests in the areas where the company operates.
The homm® reservation system, easy to use, fast and functional, is a unique tool in the hands of every user who wants to discover special properties/hotels with top features and book them easily from the comfort of his home.


Based on our experience and the know-how of the experts, we proceed with an accurate and effective evaluation related to the value of your property/hotel. Depending on the size and the location, the specific characteristics and the renovation requirements, the financial evaluation of our team completely corresponds to the givens of contemporary market and constitutes the most solid basis on which our mutual cooperation will be built.

Hello Worldwide Travelers. 

I am fortunate that I have lived abroad and
travelled to a number of places. I have travelled with, and without $.
I therefore believe the essence of travel is 'good value'. Not just the
expense, or the quality: what I consistently look for is Reliability,
Efficiency and Cleanliness (R.E.C.!). 

Whether staying in 1 or 5 star accommodation, or travelling by plane,
car or train, I have always focused on getting good value, and the R.E.C. was what insured the success of my trip, and my nice memories.

Hi, am Katerina! I was born and grew up in the wonderful island of Lesvos. I moved to Athens 20 years ago. It was very important for me to live in a house that could carry the aesthetics and the ambience of my homeland I was familiar (Website hidden by Airbnb) the Athenian appartment I chose, is right next to the "Kallimarmaro", the famous ancient marble stadium in the center of Athens, and the National Garden. Plaka area as well as the Acropolis Museum is just 10 minutes walk from my place! Even the sea I love, is not far...  less than 40  minutes ride by tram! My ideal home could not be complete without my pets, my books, my music and an amazing view to the Acropolis and Lycabettus hill, from my green roof garden! This is where I invite my best friends on summer nights , to enjoy a delicious dinner-I love to cook, traditional Mediterranean dishes!- and a glass of Greek wine, watching the Parthenon all lit up! You couldn't ask for more... don't you agree?
My favourite destination is... summer Athens by night, especially in my neighbourhood, one of the most beautiful locations in Athens .
My favourite writers are Marguerite Yurcenar and Jonathan Coe . My favourite film is "Shortbus" and all films directed by Woody Allen and Quentin Tarantino. I enjoy good music, no matter what genre it is, however jazz is what I love most. 
My motto is Mahatma Gandhi's " be the change you want to see in the world"...
I'm very excited  joining th Airbnb family! Once my dream was to manage a cozy restaurant or a boutique hotel.  But I can do that now at my own house! Knowing that my hosts will have the chance to enjoy my place and my neghborhood the way I do, makes me really happy!  
From September 2017, I decided to manage another cozy apartment in Ilissia, a great central Athens neighborhood in the Hilton area. Located in a nice, green, safe street, near a big park,  the place is ideal for young travelers, couples, businessmen and families with kids.

I live in the city center of Athens for more than 13 years now, I have studied English language in UK, and one thing I know for sure,is that the only way to get rich while spending money is when traveling the world! I am a member of a basketball team in low divisions here in Athens,i surf and snowboard with every chance i get (although time is an issue), i've been told I am very hospitable, but this is up to you to decide!! I think Greek cuisine along with the Spanish are two of the top cuisines worldwide, but I could never, never say no to a taco! If you decide to come to Greece, there are two things you should definitely try! Drink raki and go see a movie in an open air cinema!!

My name is Eftihia (Eftehea), from the words 'ef' and 'tihi' (tehe) which mean 'good' and 'luck' in ancient greek. My name is also a noun. In modern greek the word eftihia means happiness. For ancient greeks happy was the fortunate one. Nowdays happy is the joyful one. My name is quite a heavy thing to go by everyday, as it means something so great and simple (but veeeery complicated too..), that it is sometimes a real struggle to deliver its meaning and idea and project in in your life. And other's lives around you.

My parents origins are from the Peloponese and Zakynthos (Ionian Island). But I grew up in the wider terretory of Attica Prefecture, in particular in 2 suberbs of Athens- Marousi and Kifisia.

My profession is acting and as that started as a career (B.C. - before Crisis!!!) but has practically ended up a practical hobby (A.C.- after Crisis..), I am trying to reinvent myself and my life and scetch a 'plan B'..

Whatever that will occur to be, my true passion is walking barefoot on sharp rocks of isolated greek islands. If I was from India I think they would say I used to be a wild goat in a previous life. My technique in this strange extreme sport is really something to admire. I love walking in general, I like nature and even though I am definately a child of the city, my soul meets its 'core' when away from it. It is like the purity of my existence absolutely relates to the inviroment I find myself in. The landscape of a mountain or a beach or a lake or a river automatically turns me into a better person. My effort has always been to manage to carry that person with me even in the packed and trafficy Streets and Avenues of Athens.

My favourite time of the day in the area I leave in (where my house that welcomes airbnb guests is located) is between 2-6 in the morning. When the city sleeps one is able to 'pick up' and fully absorb this area's true energy. When crowded it is just another touristic place with great historical interest. But its healing effect one can only get when it is (Website hidden by Airbnb) and (Website hidden by Airbnb) l.. At times of grief, pressure or distress I found that walking (AND jogging too!) around in that neighbourhood at these hours of the day was very therapeutic.

Sharing your house with people you don't know (and- at circummstances- you might actually never even meet!!!) became possible thanks to this whole airbnb notion that you created. It is a beautiful chain that connects people who wanted more- out of traveling- than a regular hotel or rudimantary furnished/equipped apartments. That chain allows travellers to make a 'subtour'  in their tour, experience how a person from a different country and culture lives. Like a quick whimsy eavesdropping or innocent peeping that might 'salt or sweeten up' the first and last moments of ones journey to a foreign place. 

So.. Long live the AirBnB!

This is a very important and unusual booking, in that all proceeds go directly to KID & FAMILY, a charity which provides food, medical and educational support to impoverished children and their families. We also take food to refugees in Idomeni, and now in Greece's seven largest camps, including Elliniko, Eleona etc. The furniture in the flat had been donated by the Hotel Grand Bretagne, a luxury five-star hotel in the centre of Athens. The flat itself has belongs to a local philanthropist, and has been loaned to us in support of our cause. 

Hospitality is part of the Greek way of life. There is even a Greek God dedicated to the spirit of Hospitality. Jupiter (Zeus)!  It's very important to us that our guests enjoy their time here, and leave with happy memories of their stay. We can arrange taxis to and from the airport, for which there is a fixed price of €38, prearranged with the taxi companies. We are also able to provide any help, advice or recommendations guests may require during their time in Athens.

The Kid & Family team of volunteers have travelled to many different countries and experienced many different cultures, so we are sensitive to diverse needs. We look forward to meeting you, and making you feel at home in our beautiful town!

IMPORTANT ! WE TAKE CARE OF YOU!
We created for you in the flat
1. A smal charity shop where you can buy all of your souvenirs half price from any shop in the town
2. A small mini market in our Kitchen where you can choose and buy - half price from any other shop - many super market products needed to cook, to wash your clothes, as well as body & face care products
All proceeds go directly to KID & FAMILY' s efforts to support Kids & Families in need living in Greece (Greek & Refugee Families)

There is a Greek word, "filoxenia", which means, roughly, "friendship to strangers". My motto, learned from a professor in college, is "Good enough isn't".

If there is a Greek word that everyone should know it is the word "philoxenia" literally translated as "friend to a stranger" but a lot deaper than that. In ancient Greece hospitality was a value ranking high on the list of virtues-there was great respect and honor bestowed from host to guest. 
Philoxenia today is a generosity of spirit, a joyful kind of the best-of-what's-mine-is-yours attitude in which Greeks take pride as a defining attribute.
Philoxenia for me is as simple as a smile, or opening my home to guests making them feel like if it were theirs.

Fun Mythology Facts:
Nefeli (or Nephele) was the Nymph of clouds , created by Zeus to look like Hera and was considerred a goddess of hospitality.   
She was also the mother of  the famous Centaurs, and Frixus and Helle's. Do you know about the Golden Fleece and the Argonauts? Well...Nefeli was the one who send it to save her children.

The Greek word "ΦΙΛΟΞΕΝΙΑ=hospitality" is of a particular importance in the Greek culture. It’s a compound word from "ΦΙΛΩ=LOVE" and "ΞΕΝΟΣ=GUEST " and refers to the act of nestling and caring of a guest by the host. It was an institution for the ancient Greeks to welcome and take care of the guests at their home. They believed particularly in the idea of hospitality and regarded it as a moral duty and a sacred rule of the gods (Xenios Zeus was the protector of the guests). They offered them bath and sleep and they greeted them with gifts. The host and the guest were linked with friendly ties, which where inherited to their descendants. 
This is our inheritance.
It will be an honor to host you.

Welcome to my page, my name is Costas.

Born and raised in Greece, I have lived most my live in Athens. Studied here, in Univercity of Piraius, and working here also in tourists enterprises. 
What I enjoy most about Athens is the mix of culture, history, nightlife and the fact that every district of the city has its own 'soul'. 
But Exarcheia district, is my favour!. The most uncontrovercial and vibrant area in Athens. Thousents of alternative cafe, bars with all the types of music, open squads, galleries,
and of cource very very delicious traditional greek taverns and restaurands. Is a place with history,  for instance there is the Polytechnic University with the historical gate in the garden which the tank of the dictatorship flattened in 1973 to attack to the student movement fighting for the democracy.
There are pedestrian roads foul of the most famour graffities and political slogans, there is also, the Exsarcheia Square , a place which the wild youth of the city spend their time! 
So my apartment is in the center of Exarcheia in the right place! Cozy and cheap!

For the reservation, i like open and clear communication, its important. Being able to provide a suitable accommodation according to your needs, is an honor and a challenge to me.

I hope to be able to welcome you soon in one of your next visits to Greece!

We have secured high-quality accommodation and service facilities in luxury villas, select country houses as well as beautiful apartments for a dream holiday or a business trip tailored to your needs, aiming to make you feel at home. 
Visit museums and monuments that attract millions of visitors from all over the world. Delight in the renowned blue sky of Attica. Enjoy a short or longer trip to the wonderful islands or an excursion to the dozens of well-organized beaches and dreamy quiet coasts. Indulge in a dream cruise in the astonishing Aegean Sea. Stroll around plazas, shopping streets and historic quarters. Feel the beauty of simple pleasures in a typical Greek coffeehouse or local tavern. Savoir the theater, music and arts in a country known as the cradle of civilization, which has fostered culture through the centuries. Check out the numerous night entertainment options in a city that never sleeps!
We have created an alternative approach to holidays and to business travel, especially for those of you who love to combine the coziness of a home with your favorite amenities, without a strict schedule, but with special care. You deserve to enjoy unforgettable holidays, tailored to your own needs! You are free to travel for business in your own home in Greece!

Το City apartment 17 υπήρξε το πατρικό της μητέρας μου και μέναμε σαν παιδιά η αδελφή μου κι εγώ Χριστούγεννα, Πάσχα και τα καλοκαίρια. Έχω πολύ όμορφες αναμνήσεις σ' αυτό το σπίτι. Με το σύζυγό μου, το Γιώργο έχουμε δύο υπέροχα παιδιά και μια όμορφη οικογένεια. Μου αρέσει να ασχολούμαι με πολλές δραστηριότητες αλλά η μεγάλη μου αγάπη είναι η ζωγραφική. Έτσι εδώ και τέσσερα χρόνια σπουδάζω στη Σχολή εικαστικών και εφαρμοσμένων τεχνών στο Αριστοτέλειο Πανεπιστήμιο Θεσσαλονίκης και νιώθω πραγματικά πως κάνω κάτι που με εκφράζει και μου δίνει ελευθερία.
Έχουμε κάνει πολλά και όμορφα ταξίδια στην Ελλάδα και στην Ευρώπη. Μου αρέσει να ανακαλύπτω καινούρια μέρη και διαφορετικούς πολιτισμούς και παραδόσεις. Η αλήθεια είναι πως δε γνωρίζαμε μέχρι πρόσφατα τη δυνατότητα να μείνουμε σε ένα διαμέρισμα αντί για ξενοδοχείο. Η αδελφή μου, που ταξίδεψε στην Ισπανία εξ αιτίας της δουλειάς της, μου είπε πως έμεινε σε ένα διαμέρισμα και γνώρισε καλύτερα τον τόπο, τους ανθρώπους και τις συνήθειες τους. Έτσι λοιπόν πήρα την απόφαση να διαθέσω το διαμέρισμά μου προς ενοικίαση και να βοηθήσω άλλους ανθρώπους να γνωρίσουν πραγματικά την Αθήνα και να νιώσουν σαν ένα κομμάτι της!
Θεωρώ πως στη ζωή πρέπει να δοκιμάζεις καινούρια πράγματα, να μαζεύεις εμπειρίες και να γνωρίζεις νέους ανθρώπους, με στόχο να γίνεσαι καλύτερος!
Το σλόγκαν που με αντιπροσωπεύει είναι:
"Για κάθε τι στη ζωή πρέπει να περιμένεις να έρθει η κατάλληλη στιγμή. Όταν όμως έρθει πρόσεξε μην την αφήσεις να προσπεράσει!

Born and raised in Germany I have lived most of my life in Munich. So I had the opportunity to get to know people from all around the world. 

About 20 years ago I decided to move on, follow my dreams and live in Greece. After many (really many) relocations I stranded in Athens where I live permanently since 2011 and now I'm calling this city my home.

What I specially like about Athens is that each neighborhood has its own character, like living in a totally different town. Furthermore, the mixture of culture, history and nightlife Athens has to offer makes it a full-year-worth-visiting location. Just wait until you take a walk on the historic street around the Acropolis, enjoy your meal or your drinks in so different and yet beautiful places, and then you'll know what I mean.

The best moments when I travel, besides seeing monuments etc, is when I have the opportunity to know better the locals. That always leads me to one conclusion: we are like a big family on this planet, so respecting each other and having honest and open communication is the key to being happy for me.

I hope we can meet and I promise to give the best of me to make your staying an experience to share.

Dear friends,

My wife is called Xenia. Her name comes from the ancient god Zeus, also known as Xenios Zeus, God of Hospitality.
Inspired by those two names, we created the company “Athens Find Learn Fun”, with the purpose to offer our guests a safe, pleasant and entertaining environment during their stay in Athens.
As young people and young entrepreneurs, we want to provide our guests with a comfortable place to relax after a tiring day, having explored and wandered through the city of Athens.
We are pleased to meet people who love to travel, as this means that they are of free spirit, willing to get know new cultures and civilizations. Bringing people of different cultures together means respect of their diversity and this could create strong bonds of friendship.
Thank you for your trust and we hope we will live up to your expectations.

ABOUT ME  
I grew up in Athens, Greece and I decided to become a full-time Airbnb host in 2014 at the age of 28. Hospitality has always been something that I have been passionate about. I was in the music industry for many years. I hosted music events in Athens, which gave me the ability to easily interact with all types of people. Making the people around me feel good has become my core passion and purpose.

MY AIRBNB STORY 
2011 
I took a one way trip to Ibiza, Spain for self-discovery. I ended up spending 9 months on this beautiful Balearic island meeting awesome people, struggling, and working at the very well known Cafe Del Mar. Of course, this journey had its ups and downs. I'd be more than happy to describe them over coffee with you.

2012 
After Ibiza, I decided to forego the nightlife and focus on finishing my studies and accomplishing my mandatory Army duty in Greece.  

2014 
After finishing my studies in Computer Science, I ended up spending 6 months as a soldier in Cyprus.  The last 3 days before my departure back to Greece I took on the challenge to book an Airbnb for the very first time. My host, Nicolas, blew my mind with his extraordinary kindness and hospitality. As you can probably guess, that was my starting point for hosting.  

2014 UNTIL TODAY 
I have hosted more than 3,000 happy guests, shared beautiful human moments, gained financial freedom, traveled the world, became an official Airbnb public speaker, recruited and helped more than 40 new Airbnb hosts, and assisted more than 150 guests with unexpected travel issues (stolen passports, missed flights, etc).  

MY VISION 
I want to continue building my personal hospitality brand (withPanos), offer the best local experiences, create a well-being movement, share many Greek meals, travel the world, explore hospitality through kindness, and maybe one day become a proud father and spouse.  

INTERESTS 
My interests include: spiritual and personal development; running; biking; swimming; traditional Greek food; tea; gardening; reading/listening to books; taking care of my backyard wildlife; exploring the USA; and cooking (when I have the time to enjoy it). I am passionate about languages and learning. I am fluent in English and I am learning Spanish and German. I previously studied Computer Science. I am enthusiastic about human connection, listening to people’s stories, and spiritual connection. I am also passionate about dogs and nature.  

FAVORITE MUSIC, MOVIES & BOOKS 
I love music and enjoy anything from Classical to Funk, R&B, Motown, the Beatles, Classic Rock, Blues, Pop, New Age, Country, and just about anything, although I am not as well versed in Hip Hop.  Shawshank Redemption, West Side Story . . . there are so many movies I love; it just depends on my mood. I typically watch inspirational movies, true stories, documentaries, romance, dramas, period movies, martial arts, and animation. I prefer movies that are not overly violent. I have a sense of humor and loved the movie "Under Cover Brother." I like Tyler Perry movies.  I read a lot of spiritual, inspiration, and business books. I enjoy Pema Chodron and often refer to “The Power of Now” by Eckhart Tolle. I recently read "The Surrender Experiment,” “The Glass Castle,” and “Your Brain at Work." I listen to audiobooks constantly which is how I get through so many books so quickly.  

COUNTRIES I'VE VISITED 
United States, Canada, UK, France, Portugal, Spain, Italy, Netherlands, Germany, Denmark, Sweeden, Poland, Bulgaria, Romania.  

TRAVELING STYLE & HOSTING 
I am an adventurous traveler. I prefer to do and see things the locals enjoy. I prefer not to travel in groups or take cruises. I can be flexible and enjoy a range of accommodations and meals, but in general I like to keep things simple.  As a host, however, I enjoy guests who love to interact with the locals. I always make sure they feel well cared for — even spoiled. My guests enjoy my fun approach to life, as well as my interactive blackboards and world maps. I have always been complimented on my eye for detail and my desire to make even the ordinary feel special.  From the lovely views, peaceful settings, and friendly outdoor animal visitors, to the manner in which I go out of my way to make things unique and fulfill guest requests, you can count on having a positive stay and looking forward to a return visit to our beloved homes in exciting Athens.

At Olala Homes, our love for travel and hospitality defines what we do and who we are.

You are invited to stay in one of our well-designed apartments in Barcelona, Sitges, Madrid, Athens, Bucharest & Sinaia, but it's not just about flats. Just as homes are never about walls and beds, there is more to us. Our mission is to make each and every guest feel at home, with maximum comfort and happiness. We know traveling is exciting and exhausting at the same time, so we strive to give you a worry-free experience. We want you to enjoy the most out of your trip and completely relax at your temporary home.

We have long experience in hospitality industry, and have been serving more than thousands of guests. We are an international group of travel enthusiasts, and we would love to pass on the great hospitality we received during our travel professionally to our guests. See you soon!

We are a brother and sister, named George and Ariadne. George is an
historian-archaeologist and Ariadne is a chemist and pharmacist. We were
born in this house, situated in the heart of ancient Athens, at the foot
of Acropolis and the Parthenon Temple. We grew up and we played every day,
as children, in the slopes of these monuments and felt all the marvelous
sentiments of the ancient, classical greek spirit and civilization. We
hope that you will feel the marvel of the  Golden Age of Pericles and the
monuments of ancient Athens, coming as visitors and staying in our
beautiful and openheart house, with the impressive view. Our house is
situated in the foot of the Acropolis monuments, that include the Doric
greek Parthenon Temple (built in the 5th century BC), the Theatre of
Dionysus (built in 4th century BC, the birthplace of tragedy) and the
Odeon of Herodes Atticus, known as Herodeon.
We will be happy to see you in Athens.

I was born in United States and recently we relocated in Southern Greece. The best decision I ever made :) We're very social and friendly. I love nature and I have several interests and hobbies. I enjoy the healthy food and I love to cook traditional Greek cuisine; I make my own olives, pies, pizza and marmalades, using only organic ingredients from our garden and other co-op local farms. If you're lucky you could taste my famous "SPANAKOPITA" (spinach pie) :-) 

To my Messinia guests I offer the possibility to book a day trip with us, a wine-tasting, a private dinner or a cooking class. When you arrive we can choose together the right plan for you! 

I spend most of my time to grow vegetables for my family, without using any chemicals. Probably here you will taste the best “Greek Salad” you ever had! My slogan is "YAMAS" (to our health). I love people who smile, and I'm very happy to give as much smiles as possible :-) 

Enjoy your Greek experience with us. Hope to meet all of you soon! 
Safe Travels, 
Kim & Yannis

I'm an experienced host and also a very experienced traveler. Although I have travelled in many European capitals, I believe that Athens is something special. I love meeting new people and making sure that they get the best possible experience of local culture, heritage and our well-known Greek hospitality while staying in Athens. 

My main mission as a host is for my guests to feel like they are at home and that the apartment which I host can guarantee privacy, flexibility, comfort, and quality - in another words I only provide accommodation that I would be happy staying in myself!
I take time to prepare my apartment for each guest and I assist guests where I can in order to make their vacation unforgettable.
Feel free to contact me if you require any further information on my apartment or Athens!
Come and visit this beautiful city, you will also love it!

Ταξιδεύω απο πολύ νωρίς στη ζωή μου, έζησα 4 χρόνια στην Ν. Υόρκη στη δεκαετία του '80, είμαι δασκάλα χορού και ψυχοθεραπεύτρια. Έχω δημιουργήσει η ίδια, σχεδιάζοντας, διακοσμώντας και επιβλέποντας την ανακατασκευή κτισμάτων, όπως το στούντιό μου και το σπίτι μου.  Ξέρω έτσι τη διαδικασία της δημιουργίας και πόσο κόπο και χρήματα απαιτεί. Σέβομαι, είμαι υπεύθυνη ως προς τον χώρο  και μ' αρέσει να ζω σε όμορφο αισθητικά περιβάλλον με ενδιαφέροντες ανθρώπους. Δεν καπνίζω και προσπαθώ να ζω υγιεινά. Χρειάζομαι η κατοικία που βρίσκομαι να είναι καθαρή, να έχει τάξη αλλά και προσωπικότητα. Το σημαντικότερο όλων όμως για μένα είναι η θετική αλληλεπίδραση και η καλή επικοινωνία με τους ανθρώπους που έρχομαι σ' επαφή. Αγαπώ τις διαφορετικές κουλτούρες και εμπνέομαι απο την τέχνη, τον πολιτισμό. Είμαι αυτόνομος και συνεννοήσιμος άνθρωπος. Ζω μια γεμάτη ζωή στην πόλη μου.
Δεν μπορώ να ζω χωρίς την τέχνη, τη φύση, τις ζεστές σχέσεις, την ομορφιά, την αλλαγή και την εξέλιξη. Πηγαίνω τακτικά σε ταινίες κυρίως σινεφίλ, ακούω μουσική απο κλασική, μέχρι τζαζ, ροκ, ethnic, alternative rock, διαβάζω λογοτεχνία, ψυχολογία και ιστορία. Κάνω διαλογισμό μέσα απο την κίνηση για μένα και διδάσκοντας η ίδια-έχω εκπαιδεύσει πολύ κόσμό 27 χρόνια τώρα στην Ελλάδα και στο εξωτερικό. Θα με βρείτε σχετικά στο (Website hidden by Airbnb) Ως προς το φαγητό, χρειάζομαι η όμορφη γεύση να συνδυάζεται με υγιεινή διατροφή, προσπαθώ να μην τρώω συχνά κρέας και να αποφεύγω τα γαλακτοκομικά. Ως επισκέπτης είμαι υπεύθυνη, προσαρμόσιμη  και ξέρω να βάζω τα όρια μου όταν βλέπω πως μια κατάσταση δεν ανταποκρίνεται σε αυτό που χρειάζομαι. Ως οικοδεσπότης προσφέρω φροντίδα και φιλική επικοινωνία ώστε να νοιώσει ο άλλος άνετα. Βοηθάω τον ξένο σε αυτά που χρειάζεται και ακούω τις ανάγκες του. Του δίνω χώρο να γνωρίσει την καθημερινότητά μου ανάλογα με τη σχέση που έχω μαζί του. Ουσιαστικά κάθε φορά χρειάζεται να "μετράω" την απόσταση που κάνει και τους δύο να αισθάνονται όμορφα και λειτουργικά. Τα ταξίδιά μου συνήθως συνδυάζουν τη δουλειά(διδασκω στο εξωτερικό) με την απόλαυση που έχει κανείς όταν αλλάζει τόπο διαμονής, έστω και για λίγο. Έχω ταξιδέψει σε πολλές χώρες της Ευρώπης, Αμερική, και Ασία. 

Since early on in my life, I travel abroad, visiting other countries, getting familiar with their history and culture. During the 80s, I studied contemporary dance in NYC where I lived for 4 years. I am an international dance teacher and body psychotherapist. I have passion for the creation of space; thus, I have renovated and got personally involved with the reconstruction and decoration of various spaces including Present Body dance/movement studio and my flat. Having all this experience, I appreciate beauty and well-being; I enjoy living amongst interesting, cultured people; the quality of inner and outer environment is very important to me. I try to live respectful to my body and the place that surrounds me. Thus, I don’t smoke, and I enjoy good communication with the people that I meet. I love the arts, being in nature; I am open to new acquaintances, relationships that offer a ground of warmth, respect and  creativity.

We are a Property Management Company aiming for high end hospitality in the short-term-rental industry. Our handpicked apartments are carefully decorated with the guest in mind and offer a series of amenities, including Nespresso machines, flat screen TVs  and extra comfortable bedding. Our company values highlight Autonomy so that our visitors can feel free and flexible, Authenticity so that travelers can experience the best of Greek culture and Amenities so that visitors receive nothing but extra care during their stay with us.

MY PROFILE : (in english, italian, greek)
ENGLISH:
I am an architect who studied in Florence and  consider Italy my second home country. In 2006 I refurbished a building in "Ampelokipoi - Athens" and transformed it in rental furnitured apartments which offer a warm and cosy environment to Athens visitors. As I am a third generation Athenian I know many secrets of this city and am willing to share them with you. I speak good italian, english, french and some spanish. Together with my wife Evangelia we manage this airbnb apartment which was our previous personal residence. We like travels, good company and food, arts and music.
ITALIANO:
Mi sono laureato in architettura a Firenze (... nel secolo scorso!!!) e considero l' Italia la mia seconda patria. Nel 2006 ho restaurato un vecchio edificio scolastico nel quartiere di "Ampelokipoi" e l' ho trasformato in appartamenti ammobiliati (Evmaros Apartments) per offrire un ambiente caldo ed accogliente a chi viene a visitare Atene. Dal momento che sono nato qui conosco tantissimi segreti di questa citta' e saro' felice di condividerli con voi. Parlo bene l' italiano, l' inglese, il francese e un po' di spagnolo. Insieme a mia moglie Evangelia gestiamo questo appartamento airbnb che per tanti anni e' stata la nostra casa. Ci piace viaggiare, la buona compagnia, il buon cibo le arti e la musica.

Vaso‘s house is located in Ano Patissia, approximately 3 km from the center of Athens and in proximity to public transport stations (bus and metro).

Patissia is a historic district of Athens. At the end of the 19th and the beginning of the 20th century many wealthy Athenians chose this area to built their summer houses. For this reason one sees many neoclassical houses with the distinctive architecture of this period. These neoclassical summer houses with gardens consisted the first garden district of Athens, parts of which one can still recognize to date.

Vaso’s house is located in the center of this area (Kypriadou) which is situated very close to the Center but not inside the busy tourist area.

Patission street starts from the center of Athens (it is the extension of Aiolou street which leads to Acropole) and divides Patissia in two areas. Ano Patissia (Upper side Patissia), where Vaso’s house is located, retains many of the characteristic elements of the old Athens (houses with gardens, squares, green sides). Kato Patissia (Lower side Patissia) underwent a rapid urbanization during the 1950’s and today in some parts the effects of the economical crisis are quite evident.

Ano Patissia during the 1980’s and 1990’s was a reference point for the rock stage with many of the classical rock spots still in operation, very close to Vaso’s house.

Patission street is of historical significance for Greece’s contemporary political history. The Polytechnic school and the School of Economics are located on this street, the universities from which the riot against the dictatorship commenced (in 1973).

Vaso’ s house was originally one of these summer villas and was renovated in 1987. The ground floor is built from stone and thus particularly cool during the summer months! It retains many of the characteristics of the old architectural style, with tall ceilings, spacious rooms and a lemon tree garden.

Dear friends, I have made a very clean environment with all the necessary and aesthetically appreciated by the people who love the simplicity and the warm environment. In the neighborhood you will experience the intensity of the Athenian night in all its forms, in the apartment you will rest in absolute tranquility, while during the whole day you will enlighten the brilliant Athenian sun. You will not miss the coolness of the airconditioned or the shadow of the big umbrella on the balcony.

In the past it was the personal office of my husband, philologist and poet, but also my son's residence, who now works in the abroad. A library has been assembled, with a lot of love, qualitative books of all types: poetry and prose, theater and history, philosophy, politics and so many others that were useful as tools of information, study and writing. Today, a part of this library is placed in the disposal of the tenants of the apartment, who might want to rest from their tour in the city reading a beautiful book that exists in the bookshelves. It's my pleasure to know that my visitors who come from far away will read the books that we loved so much and also accompanied our life. My request, please place the books in their place, so the library remain undivided. I hope you have a good time and if you need something please let me know.
