Kalimera, I’m Alex, and welcome to Athens! At Gaia, we encourage our guests to enjoy what the real Greece has to offer and we want to show you that the local way is the only way!

Being Greek, family and hospitality is deeply rooted within our culture, and is at the heart of everything we do here at Gaia. We want our guests to feel right at home in our wonderful city, and however long your stay, we promise to make it a truly enjoyable authentic Greek experience; come and discover what it means to live the local way!

Guests’ safety and comfort is at the top of our list, and we strive to make sure your stay at Gaia meets all your needs as a home from home - we are proud this summer to offer our guests newly renovated rooms, with optimum comfort in mind. I learnt from a young age the value of hospitality and I understand how important it is to feel at home, more than ever when you are away. Growing up with and working in hospitality, I was inspired by my love of meeting new people, making connections, and most of all, helping these people get the most out of their experiences - so much so, that I have formed a career around the business of making this happen! We want to make sure guests don’t just have a place to stay, but gain as much as they can from their visit to Athens! People come from all parts of the world to visit our amazing city as their chosen holiday destination - it’s my job (and my pleasure!) to help make their experience the best it can possibly be!

Athens to me is home; the people, the kindness shown within the community and to strangers alike - we have an amazing atmosphere here, and it’s one you won’t find anywhere else in the world. Here in Athens we like to have fun, we delight in the old and embrace the new - which you’ll see wherever you walk within the city - the beautiful meeting of Modern and Ancient Greece. A city that has it all, everything for everyone - and so much more than a visit to the Acropolis! I want to share this special connection I have with the city with others, and encourage visitors, both Greek and international, to explore the place I’m proud to call home. Let me show you my Athens! 

Psirri in particular, is the buzzing neighbourhood where you’ll find us (along with the best hangouts and eateries in Athens!) - the Gaia family is proud to be part of a community that represents the very soul of the city. Experience real Greece here; eat what the locals do, drink with us, explore our streets you haven’t read about yet, take a walk through our history, modern and ancient - and live the local way!

Since my family and I began constructing Gaia in 2016, we have worked hard to expand, and are now able to offer more options for our guests seeking independent accommodation within the heart of the city. With our guests’ needs in mind, we’re now managing premium apartments, in the perfect location, which capture the authenticity and spirit of Psyri; you’ll be able to experience the real Athens like a local, with all the amenities you need to feel at home.
 
Gaia was created by family for family - since we started out as a small hotel with only a few rooms open, people have loved staying with us because of our incredible culture of going above and beyond when it comes to hospitality - my family has always lived by this principle, and we welcome all of our guests as we do our own family - we’ll make sure you won’t leave Athens without a full stomach, a story to tell and a promise to come back and visit! We look forward to welcoming you soon!

**To all our potential guests: due to tax legislation in Greece ,since December 2018, all guests must provide their VAT number or Gov ID number or Passport number in order to the host prior to check in time, as this info must be reported to the Greek tax authorities. 

We assure you that any personal info our guests provide to us, is only used for submission to the tax authority and afterwards promptly gets deleted.  This info is NEVER  given to any other third party. The personal details provided to us are solely used for submitting the info required to he Greek tax authorities. The guests who provide this info to us explicitly consent and authorize our company for this sole purpose, namely to supply the info to the Greek tax authorities.

For any matter or issue relating to tax legislation in Greece and the data protection law requirements that our company complies with (GDPR) please send us a message through the Airbnb system. 

The Ascentum team.

Michael Odysseus Yakoumakis was born on 1956 in Athens of Greece. He graduated in Fine Arts (Painting) and in Geological Sciences at Naples of Italy, and in Computer Science at Athens. He enhanced his education and experience by learning Sumi-e, Comic Design, Incision & Printmaking, Artistic Book-binding and Graphics Design.


He is a regular member of the Chamber of Fine Arts of Greece, Greece's official professional guild of fine artists, supervised by the Hellenic Ministry of Culture


He worked as a Systems Engineer and Fine Artist until 2003, when he decided to focus exclusively on the Fine Arts. Since then he lives in Athens where he works as a Painter, Illustrator, Tutor of Fine Arts and Fantasy Fiction Writer. 
He founded the “Romantic Anonymous Fellowship”, Athenian group of the “Stuckism International” movement of Fine Artists.


He writes and illustrates two series of fantasy fiction graphic literature: “The Chronicles of the Archipelago” and “The Chronicles of the West”. 


His painting oeuvre has, until now, been presented at several personal shows in Athens, Kythera Island and Thessaloniki and at several group shows in Montreal, Nicosia, London, Rome, Hamburg, Liverpool, Florence, Athens, Canterbury and New York.


Interests and hobbies

He is a dedicated martial artist. Since 1974 he practices daily Katori Shinto Ryu, Shorin Ryu Karate Do, Matayoshi Kobudo and Fiore dei Liberi.

He tries sincerely to practice Zen Buddhism, Druidism and Shamanism consistently.

He is a passionate amateur scholar of History and Sociology.

He loves reading quality literature and fiction (with an emphasis to Fantasy and Sci-Fi), listening to quality music (mostly Medieval, Renaissance, Classical, Jazz, Old Rock, Ethnic and Electronic) and watching quality movies (among his favourite film-directors Akira Kurosawa, Hayao Miyazaki, the Taviani Brothers,  Luc Besson, Stanley Kubrick, Louis Bunuel, Ridley Scott, Alfred Hitchcock, Lina Wertmüller, Wim Wenders, Martin Scorsese, Quentin Tarantino)

He enjoys greatly hiking on the mountains and in the forests, bicycling, camping outdoors and travelling far and for long (He dreams visiting Latin America, China and Japan).

Some of his most dear friends are cats. He bears no enmity to anyone...

As family we always loved trips. This is what connected us.

As soon as we disembarked on Crete  in 2005 for the first time, this island became the shelter we have eagerly been looking for; not only as a place to spend our holidays on, but also as a genuine paradise where everything is possible. However we never abandoned neither our birth city and second Luna base, that of Athens, nor the beautiful Peloponnese and Evia island which still play an important role as the origin of our chilhood’s greatest memories and campers secrets.

After spending more than twenty years in sports management, catamaran sailing and yachting business, providing camping on the sea to adventurous travelers, we combined our love for luxurious compact motorhomes/automobiles and versatile flexible vans. Our RVs experience connected all the dots that represent our favorite destinations in one big road trip circle of partnerships and experiences. All those years we sought hidden spots & places, tried hard to find the best tips locals have to offer and eventually we combined all these campers experiences to our network of discount partners and to the greatest travel guide for campers! That was when the Hermes and his crew, designed Luna Trips RVs & Campers Road Trip Network.

While in this balsamic Moon phase, you need more nurturing time than ever before, alone or with loved ones. It’s time for long luxuriant dives into the sea, tranquil nights reading, listening to music or doing the most natural thing of all: chatting with those you admire, sharing experiences, your deepest fears and your highest dreams, preparing a meal as a token of appreciation to yourself and those around you, spending time in serenity and isolation. This LunaTrips Campers experience is as unique as the logo’s moon eclipse…

Our Partner Success Team offers Property Management Listing Service to help hosts boost the popularity and booking ratio of their short-term rentals by creating a high-quality profile of their property, distributing the listing on 20+ global rental websites, and managing inquiries and bookings on hosts' behalf. I enjoy travelling and meeting people with different cultures from other countries. I've lived in London, in Athens and in a tiny greek island.  I've always dealt with tourism. Now, as a hostess, I have the opportunity to show Athens to visitors, on and off the beaten track!

My friends always tell me that they wish they could stay in my place all the time because it makes them feel good and has positive vibes. I do have an optimistic outlook on life, and I also love treating people like royalty, so maybe my home shares some of my qualities. I work as a make-up artist, masseuse and podologist, so I like helping people relax and feel at home. I love meeting new people and interacting with different cultures. In my spare time, I am involved in animal rescue, and I have helped to shelter, feed and find homes for hundreds of stray dogs and cats over the past sixteen years. Many of them required veterinary care because they were abused, malnourished, or sick. 
I take my hosting duties very seriously because I understand that the few days a guest stays at my place may be the only time of the year they can relax and recharge their batteries. Αncient Greeks believed that filoxenia (hospitality) was a sacred duty because the gods disguised themselves as guests and visited them in order to test their kindness. The host and the guests were united with eternal bonds of friendship which their children inherited. This is how I interact with my guests, always taking time to pay attention to individual needs and questions they may have or advice they need to get around. I look forward to welcoming you with a bottle of Greek wine.

Following a corporate career of more than 25 years, I have devoted the last 7 years of my professional life materializing a lifelong dream and mission: creating unique experiences for demanding, discerning, tasteful and refined guests who visit Greece for vacation or professional purposes. 

I have established, own and operate two companies: BLUSCAPES HOMES which owns and manages unique properties and BLUSCAPES YACHTING which owns and manages three luxury motor yachts. 

There are four differentiating factors that make us distinctive in creating unique experiences for our distinguished guests: (1) the fact that we own and manage the properties (and yachts), with myself being personally and directly involved in operating the properties and serving our guests; (2) the extreme attention to detail and quality, directly visible in all properties; (3) the refined and sophisticated interior design and functionality of the properties; and (4) the capability to offer a wide variety of highest quality optional services within the properties and the yachts (e.g., private chef, on site constant guest service and house-keeping) and beyond (e.g., organization of cultural, entertainment and sightseeing experiences both in and outside Athens tailored to our guests preferences - including personal guides if relevant, advice and reservations in restaurants & bars in line with our guests tastes and luxury transportation for all possible guest needs).

Ονομάζομαι Ηλιας,
Αρχικά θα ηθελα  να σας ευχαριστήσω για το ενδιαφέρον που δείχνετε στα διαμερίσματα μας.
Σας διαβεβαιώνω οτι τα διαμερίσματα μας θα ειναι παντα πεντακάθαρα(γιατι αυτη ειναι η προτεραιότητα μας), οι τιμες μας θα  παραμένουν σταθερα  ΧΑΜΗΛΑ γιατι αντιλαμβανόμαστε τις αναγκες του Έλληνα αλλα και του ξένου επισκέπτη όπως επισης θα σας παρέχουν τις απαραίτητες παροχές για να εχετε μια ευχάριστη διαμονή.
Για να τα επιτυχω λοιπον ολα αυτα θα ηθελα να γνωρίζετε οτι σε αυτην την "επιχειρηματική δραστηριότητα" φυσικα και δεν ΕΙΜΑΙ ΜΟΝΟΣ,μαζι μου ειναι και θα ειναι ΟΛΗ Η ΟΙΚΟΓΕΝΕΙΑ ΜΟΥ οπου θα παλεύουμε παντα για να τηρούμε τις υποσχέσεις μας. 

Παρατήρηση Ν 1:
Θέλω να σας παρακαλέσω να μην μου στέλνετε πριν απο επιβεβαιωμένη κρατηση αριθμούς γιατι δεν τους λαμβανω.
Παρατήρηση Ν 2:
Ο λόγος που ζητάω ΑΦΜ ειναι γιατι πια ειναι μια απαραίτητη διαδικασία,αυτοί που δεν σας το ζητάνε λογικα δεν εχουν ΑΜΑ(αριθμο μητρώου ακινήτου)που σημαινει οτι ειναι με παράνομο τροπο στην βραχυχρόνια ή απλα ειναι η κατηγορία δεν βαριέσαι....
Παρατήρηση Ν 3:
Όταν μου ζητάτε για χαμηλότερη τιμη σας παρακαλώ πολυ μην το παρακάνετε.Επισης πολλοι μου στέλνετε μηνύματα για μακροχρόνιες κρατήσεις,ενημερώνω εδω ό,τι σε ολα μας τα ακινητα εχω βαλει μεγαλη έκπτωση για κρατησεις απο εναν μηνα και πανω ούτως ωστε να κανετε την κρατηση σας απο εδω,απευθειας, με αποτέλεσμα να γλιτώνουμε ολοι χρονο και να έχουμε και την ασφάλεια της σελιδας.επισημαίνω ό,τι αυτο ζημιώνει εμάς γιατι ειμαστε χαμένοι με τις κρατήσεις κτλ αλλα πραγματικά ο χρόνος ειναι ενα υπερπολυτιμο αγαθό.ΟΠΟΤΕ αν θελετε εναν μήνα βαζετε ημερομηνίες 1 μηνα και αυτο που βλέπετε στο ΒΝΒ ειναι η τιμη είτε απο πλατφορμα ειτε εκτος.
Στην τιμη που βλέπετε να σκέφτεστε πρωτα πριν αντιδράσετε για ακριβη τιμή, ό,τι μεσα στην τιμη ειναι η ΔΕΗ,ΝΕΡΟ,ΚΟΙΝΌΧΡΗΣΤΑ....
Παρατήρηση Ν 4:
Προσπαθώ παντα να παρέχω οσο των δυνατών περισσότερες πληροφορίες-φωτογραφίες  για το που βρίσκεται το διαμέρισμα και με ποια μεσα μεταφοράς εξυπηρετείται και ποια είναι αυτα,οποτε σας ικετεύω πριν στείλετε μηνύματα για το που ειναι το σπιτι ή πόση ωρα απο το μετρο κ.τ.λ δειτε καλυτερα ολες τις φωτογραφίες και διαβαστε τις λεζάντες για το καθε διαμέρισμά.
Παρατήρηση Ν 5:
Σε περίπτωση που κανετε καποια κράτηση για λογαριασμό τρίτου βεβαιωθείτε οτι εχει λαβει ολες τις απαραίτητες πληροφοριες που χρειάζεται για το ακίνητο που του εχετε κλείσει, στέλνοντας του φωτογραφίες με screenshot αυτα που μπορεί να μην του ταιριάζουν ούτως ώστε να ειναι και αυτος σύμφωνος οτι το κατάλυμα κάλυπτει τις αναγκες του.

Τελος ευχομαι σε ολους υγεια να ειστε ολοι μα ΟΛΟΙ καλα και να χαμογελάτε για να κανετε τους αλλους να ανησυχούν !

Observation N 1:
I want to tell you please don't  send me numbers before confirmed booking  because I don't get them.
Observation N 2:
The reason I am asking for ID NUMBER is because it is a necessary procedure,anyone else who didn't ask for it probably he didn't make his work correctly. 
Observation N 3:
When you ask me for a lower price please do not overdo it.
From the platform here you are going to get the biggest discount if you close directly 1 month,so wherever the price is from the platform, it is the same and outside of it,so please do the reservation from here and we both win time and safety. 
Observation N 4:
I am always trying to provide as much information as possible about the location of the apartment and with which means of transport it is serviced and which ones are, and I beg you don't  send me messages about where the house is or how much time from the meter etc. See all the photos better and read the captions for each apartment.
Observation N 5: 
If you make a reservation on behalf of a third party, make sure that it has received all the necessary information for the property you have closed, by sending the photos with  screenshots that may not match it so that it is also in agreement that the property is covered his needs.

Finally, I wish to all of you to be healthy to be ALL ALL good and to smile to make others worry!

I am an academic in law, and a lawyer. I am Greek, living mainly in the UK but also spending a substantial part of calendar year in Greece. I love the sun and the sea and I am passionate for music, theater, the opera and the arts in general, as well as museums and ancient civilizations. One of the main reasons I decided to get involved with the airbnb market was the positive experiences I had, over the years, being myself a customer. I came to realise how important is to built relationships through the airbnb service converting a simple stay into a personised experience that not only offers a comfortable stay but also promotes a vivid exchange of customs, experiences, education, ways of life e.t.c. 
I strive to provide an all-round service that accomodates all your needs. 

 My favourite task is to offer my guests the best  possible experience.  Over the years and having lived for so  many years abroad and in several countries, either for work commintments or at times by choice,  I gained  the ability to make people feel comfortable, respected and appreciated. 

From my experience in life as a professional and inspired from my hobby, acting, I’ve got a life motto: 'Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong, have faith, and travel as much as you can''.

I wish cooperation and I believe that success is more enjoyable when you share it with others.
I’m quite sensitive with the elderly and the children.  I believe that each one of us should have the right to  quality and enjoyment in life. I try to be supportive with those having higher demands and discreet with those needing higher privacy. I’m passionate about keeping my guests happy.
I believe that there’s no indulgence without esthetics and this applies to all aspects of one’s life. Athens and generally the region of Attica is gifted with natural beauty, harmony and unspoken esthetics manifested through its splendid landscape, light and its sea "Saronic gulf" with a superb coastline.

I believe that Skynest apARTment gives its guests that feeling of unforced quality and exquisite taste combined with a really homely atmosfere, satisfying even the most difficult demands.
My current big bet is to offer high quality indoor and outdoor services to our guests.
I’ll be happy to be your host.

I am a 30 years old, finishing my master's degree in Global Development Management at the University of Kristiansand, Norway.

What I enjoy most in life is interacting with people and experiencing new things with others. I am curious and open-minded by nature, and love experiencing new food, people and every other experience that nature and culture has to offer.
The hobbies that take up most of my time (next to my studies), relates to challenges which are shared by people regardless of national boundaries, such as; [geo-]politics, conflicts, climate and the 'human condition'.



When it comes to travelling, it is my impression that all destinations that reach a certain amount of popularity, inevitably ends up professionalising tourism and thus hollowing out what visitors would like to experience, leading to commodification rather than natural interactions. As such, I always do my best to seek out the sides, parts and places of any destination that I perceive to be as 'local' as possible - otherwise all that is obtained is people attempting to paint a picture they think one wants to see - rather than the cultured and local experiences one is actually after.

As a general perspective, I prefer to focus on what we as members of this precious planet all share in common, rather than what sets us apart based on differences in culture, religion and our unique traditions. Respect, peace, love and prosperity to all - regardless of any specifications each of us may carry :)

Hi there, I’m Leo, Athens-born in 1991. Driven by my passion for the hospitality industry, I pursued my BA in Management, MA in Marketing and completed various hospitality courses. And, in 2018, I took things one step further, launching ‘Live & Travel Greece’, a 360 concierge service, offering anything from luxury accommodation, transport services, events and activities-planning, to reservations at renowned Mykonian restaurants and clubs. At ‘Live & Travel Greece’, we pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service by making ourselves indispensable to guests throughout their stay. So, whether you’re looking to book with us or simply get some top tips on the island, I look forward to hearing from you and hopefully welcoming you to the island soon!

I am George and I was born in Athens in 1987. The historical centre of Athens is “my home”. I went school at Plaka, and my memories as a kid go back to my grandpa who lived and worked at Psyri. The two of us used to have long walks at the city center every day after school. As a student in graphic design I have worked in many restaurants and clubs in the area, so I can suggest anything you would wish for. Greece and the world is for me a curious and passionate travel. I am Giannis, an entrepreneur and escape room owner. I really like meeting new people from all over the world while travelling or, even better, having them visit Athens and hosting them! I am energetic and forward-thinking (or so my friends and colleagues say about me), a physical as well as intellectual person. I enjoy football and alternative sports, but also reading good books and of course activities like puzzles and escape rooms, things I do for a living!
I have travelled all over Europe and Africa and I consider Paris and Budapest my favourite destinations, places of history but also modern and cosmopolitan, having many things to see and do.
Films and TV shows about historic events and murder mysteries are my favorite and recently I got infatuated with Money Heist (“La casa de Papel”). while my literature of choice is mainly classic and timeless. I could not imagine myself as I am today without having read “Around the World in 80 Days” in my childhood!
I enjoy Mediterranean and Greek traditional cuisine, but I would like to taste every culinary tradition the world has to offer.
As for a life moto? “You can learn more for a person by playing with him/her for an hour than by a year-long conversation”, by Greek philosopher Plato.

K&M VILLAS is a recently formulated investment consortium with K&M CREATIVE, a London-based boutique marketing agency with a specialty in the luxury industry.
Equipped with more than 4 decades of experience in the hospitality industry, K&M VILLAS aims to become established as the most successful luxury villa provider & management agency in Greece & beyond.

The property portfolio of the company already includes some of the finest properties in destinations such as the Athens Riviera, Skiathos, Mykonos and Syros.

Thanks to the affiliation of the company with K&M CREATIVE, one of the most up & coming luxury travel marketing agencies in Greece and the United Kingdom, K&M VILLAS is the only company in Greece that offers villa management services with an emphasis on marketing communications.

All of the properties that our included in our portfolio have been handpicked by our luxury specialists. We choose all of our villas based on a strict procedure which evaluates criteria such as location and product value, interior decoration and amenities as well as potential for future improvements and expansion.

Our mission is to provide high valued services for both our clients and their guests, providing a 360 degree management service, specifically tailored for rapid business expansion and long-term client satisfaction.

Hello,
I am Stella " happy traveler" for the last forty years. We decided to do something that we love very much, through AIRBNB.
The Greek word "ΦΙΛΟΞΕΝΙΑ=hospitality" is of particular importance in the Greek culture. It’s a compound word from "ΦΙΛΩ=LOVE" and "ΞΕΝΟΣ=GUEST " and refers to the act of nesting and caring for a guest by the host. It was an institution for the ancient Greeks to welcome and take care of the guests at their home. They believed particularly in the idea of hospitality and regarded it as a moral duty and a sacred rule of the gods (Xenios Zeus was the protector of the guests). They offered them bath and sleep and they greeted them with gifts. The host and the guest were linked with friendly ties, which where inherited to their descendants.
This is our inheritance! 
We will be more than glad to host you in our home.

Hello everyone! 
   I am Sissy, I’m fully affected by the Greek bright sun and blue sea and I love swimming and rolling in the waves.  
   When going abroad, I consider myself a traveler, not a tourist. The difference between those two is that a traveler doesn’t need to go with the mass but to explore himself. In order to do so, he needs to know that before the exploration and afterwards, there will always be a spotless house to rest, with warm bed, soft fresh linens and a comfortable kitchen. What a traveler needs is a home away from home.
By offering my places through airbnb I put my own delight in a first place. In each traveler I see myself when being abroad and think what was that missing from my own trips. For this reason, I decorated all of my places on my own and I was thrilled about the future guests. This satisfaction makes the hosting experience a hobby, and never a job.
   It is a great honor for me to receive your enjoyment when staying at my apartment. You are always welcome!

Hello!!! Step One Luxury Suites are located in the shade of the rock of Acropolis, in "Plaka", the ancient part of Athens city centre, right next to the Museum and the archaeological sites of the Acropolis.
The Suites are housed in a neoclassical building of 1836, on the basement of which, the world-renowned painter "Takis Moraitis" continues to paint next to an ancient 2000-year-old jar.
Our unit consists of 3 separate rooms, with Greek breakfast and free wifi. Our special feature is the dome on the ceiling of our room "Aerides".
On the ground floor of the building you can taste homade Greek donuts, traditional sweets and ice cream from "Peters" shop.
From our unit, you have quick and easy access to "Parthenonas", the Columns of the Olympian Zeus, the "Erechtheion", the Roman Market, the Panathenaic Stadium and Syntagma Square.

Καλησπερα κοσμε !

Ονομάζομαι Στρατος,
Αρχικά θα ηθελα  να σας ευχαριστήσω για το ενδιαφέρον που δείχνετε στα διαμερίσματα μας.
Σας διαβεβαιώνω οτι τα διαμερίσματα μας θα ειναι παντα πεντακάθαρα(γιατι αυτη ειναι η προτεραιότητα μας), οι τιμες μας θα  παραμένουν σταθερα  ΧΑΜΗΛΑ γιατι αντιλαμβανόμαστε τις αναγκες του Έλληνα αλλα και του ξένου επισκέπτη όπως επισης θα σας παρέχουν τις απαραίτητες παροχές για να εχετε μια ευχάριστη διαμονή.
Για να τα επιτυχω λοιπον ολα αυτα θα ηθελα να γνωρίζετε οτι σε αυτην την "επιχειρηματική δραστηριότητα" φυσικα και δεν ΕΙΜΑΙ ΜΟΝΟΣ,μαζι μου ειναι και θα ειναι ΟΛΗ Η ΟΙΚΟΓΕΝΕΙΑ ΜΟΥ οπου θα παλεύουμε παντα για να τηρούμε τις υποσχέσεις μας. 

Παρατήρηση Ν 1:
Θέλω να σας παρακαλέσω να μην μου στέλνετε πριν απο επιβεβαιωμένη κρατηση αριθμούς γιατι δεν τους λαμβανω.
Παρατήρηση Ν 2:
Ο λόγος που ζητάω ΑΦΜ ειναι γιατι πια ειναι μια απαραίτητη διαδικασία,αυτοί που δεν σας το ζητάνε λογικα δεν εχουν ΑΜΑ(αριθμο μητρώου ακινήτου)που σημαινει οτι ειναι με παράνομο τροπο στην βραχυχρόνια ή απλα ειναι η κατηγορία δεν βαριέσαι....
Παρατήρηση Ν 3:
Όταν μου ζητάτε για χαμηλότερη τιμη σας παρακαλώ πολυ μην το παρακάνετε.Επισης πολλοι μου στέλνετε μηνύματα για μακροχρόνιες κρατήσεις,ενημερώνω εδω ό,τι σε ολα μας τα ακινητα εχω βαλει μεγαλη έκπτωση για κρατησεις απο εναν μηνα και πανω ούτως ωστε να κανετε την κρατηση σας απο εδω,απευθειας, με αποτέλεσμα να γλιτώνουμε ολοι χρονο και να έχουμε και την ασφάλεια της σελιδας.επισημαίνω ό,τι αυτο ζημιώνει εμάς γιατι ειμαστε χαμένοι με τις κρατήσεις κτλ αλλα πραγματικά ο χρόνος ειναι ενα υπερπολυτιμο αγαθό.ΟΠΟΤΕ αν θελετε εναν μήνα βαζετε ημερομηνίες 1 μηνα και αυτο που βλέπετε στο ΒΝΒ ειναι η τιμη είτε απο πλατφορμα ειτε εκτος.
Στην τιμη που βλέπετε να σκέφτεστε πρωτα πριν αντιδράσετε για ακριβη τιμή, ό,τι μεσα στην τιμη ειναι η ΔΕΗ,ΝΕΡΟ,ΚΟΙΝΌΧΡΗΣΤΑ....
Παρατήρηση Ν 4:
Προσπαθώ παντα να παρέχω οσο των δυνατών περισσότερες πληροφορίες-φωτογραφίες  για το που βρίσκεται το διαμέρισμα και με ποια μεσα μεταφοράς εξυπηρετείται και ποια είναι αυτα,οποτε σας ικετεύω πριν στείλετε μηνύματα για το που ειναι το σπιτι ή πόση ωρα απο το μετρο κ.τ.λ δειτε καλυτερα ολες τις φωτογραφίες και διαβαστε τις λεζάντες για το καθε διαμέρισμά.
Παρατήρηση Ν 5:
Σε περίπτωση που κανετε καποια κράτηση για λογαριασμό τρίτου βεβαιωθείτε οτι εχει λαβει ολες τις απαραίτητες πληροφοριες που χρειάζεται για το ακίνητο που του εχετε κλείσει, στέλνοντας του φωτογραφίες με screenshot αυτα που μπορεί να μην του ταιριάζουν ούτως ώστε να ειναι και αυτος σύμφωνος οτι το κατάλυμα κάλυπτει τις αναγκες του.

Τελος ευχομαι σε ολους υγεια να ειστε ολοι μα ΟΛΟΙ καλα και να χαμογελάτε για να κανετε τους αλλους να ανησυχούν !

Good evening World !

My name is Stratos,
I would  like to thank you first for your interest in our apartments.

I will assure you that our apartments will always be clean (because this is our priority), our prices will remain stable LOW because we understand the needs of both Greek and the foreign visitor,as well will provide you with the necessary services to have a pleasant accommodation.
In order to achieve these, I would like you to know that in this "business activity" of course I am NOT BY MY OWN , with me is and will be MY FAMILY and we will always fight to keep our promises.

Observation N 1:
I want to tell you please don't  send me numbers before confirmed booking  because I don't get them.
Observation N 2:
The reason I am asking for ID NUMBER is because it is a necessary procedure,anyone else who didn't ask for it probably he didn't make his work correctly. 
Observation N 3:
When you ask me for a lower price please do not overdo it.
From the platform here you are going to get the biggest discount if you close directly 1 month,so wherever the price is from the platform, it is the same and outside of it,so please do the reservation from here and we both win time and safety. 
Observation N 4:
I am always trying to provide as much information as possible about the location of the apartment and with which means of transport it is serviced and which ones are, and I beg you don't  send me messages about where the house is or how much time from the meter etc. See all the photos better and read the captions for each apartment.
Observation N 5: 
If you make a reservation on behalf of a third party, make sure that it has received all the necessary information for the property you have closed, by sending the photos with  screenshots that may not match it so that it is also in agreement that the property is covered his needs.

Finally, I wish to all of you to be healthy to be ALL ALL good and to smile to make others worry!

Ονομάζομαι Αναστασια,
Αρχικά θα ηθελα  να σας ευχαριστήσω για το ενδιαφέρον που δείχνετε στα διαμερίσματα μας.
Σας διαβεβαιώνω οτι τα διαμερίσματα μας θα ειναι παντα πεντακάθαρα(γιατι αυτη ειναι η προτεραιότητα μας), οι τιμες μας θα  παραμένουν σταθερα  ΧΑΜΗΛΑ γιατι αντιλαμβανόμαστε τις αναγκες του Έλληνα αλλα και του ξένου επισκέπτη όπως επισης θα σας παρέχουν τις απαραίτητες παροχές για να εχετε μια ευχάριστη διαμονή.
Για να τα επιτυχω λοιπον ολα αυτα θα ηθελα να γνωρίζετε οτι σε αυτην την "επιχειρηματική δραστηριότητα" φυσικα και δεν ΕΙΜΑΙ ΜΟΝΟΣ,μαζι μου ειναι και θα ειναι ΟΛΗ Η ΟΙΚΟΓΕΝΕΙΑ ΜΟΥ οπου θα παλεύουμε παντα για να τηρούμε τις υποσχέσεις μας. 

Παρατήρηση Ν 1:
Θέλω να σας παρακαλέσω να μην μου στέλνετε πριν απο επιβεβαιωμένη κρατηση αριθμούς γιατι δεν τους λαμβανω.
Παρατήρηση Ν 2:
Ο λόγος που ζητάω ΑΦΜ ειναι γιατι πια ειναι μια απαραίτητη διαδικασία,αυτοί που δεν σας το ζητάνε λογικα δεν εχουν ΑΜΑ(αριθμο μητρώου ακινήτου)που σημαινει οτι ειναι με παράνομο τροπο στην βραχυχρόνια ή απλα ειναι η κατηγορία δεν βαριέσαι....
Παρατήρηση Ν 3:
Όταν μου ζητάτε για χαμηλότερη τιμη σας παρακαλώ πολυ μην το παρακάνετε.Επισης πολλοι μου στέλνετε μηνύματα για μακροχρόνιες κρατήσεις,ενημερώνω εδω ό,τι σε ολα μας τα ακινητα εχω βαλει μεγαλη έκπτωση για κρατησεις απο εναν μηνα και πανω ούτως ωστε να κανετε την κρατηση σας απο εδω,απευθειας, με αποτέλεσμα να γλιτώνουμε ολοι χρονο και να έχουμε και την ασφάλεια της σελιδας.επισημαίνω ό,τι αυτο ζημιώνει εμάς γιατι ειμαστε χαμένοι με τις κρατήσεις κτλ αλλα πραγματικά ο χρόνος ειναι ενα υπερπολυτιμο αγαθό.ΟΠΟΤΕ αν θελετε εναν μήνα βαζετε ημερομηνίες 1 μηνα και αυτο που βλέπετε στο ΒΝΒ ειναι η τιμη είτε απο πλατφορμα ειτε εκτος.
Στην τιμη που βλέπετε να σκέφτεστε πρωτα πριν αντιδράσετε για ακριβη τιμή, ό,τι μεσα στην τιμη ειναι η ΔΕΗ,ΝΕΡΟ,ΚΟΙΝΌΧΡΗΣΤΑ....
Παρατήρηση Ν 4:
Προσπαθώ παντα να παρέχω οσο των δυνατών περισσότερες πληροφορίες-φωτογραφίες  για το που βρίσκεται το διαμέρισμα και με ποια μεσα μεταφοράς εξυπηρετείται και ποια είναι αυτα,οποτε σας ικετεύω πριν στείλετε μηνύματα για το που ειναι το σπιτι ή πόση ωρα απο το μετρο κ.τ.λ δειτε καλυτερα ολες τις φωτογραφίες και διαβαστε τις λεζάντες για το καθε διαμέρισμά.
Παρατήρηση Ν 5:
Σε περίπτωση που κανετε καποια κράτηση για λογαριασμό τρίτου βεβαιωθείτε οτι εχει λαβει ολες τις απαραίτητες πληροφοριες που χρειάζεται για το ακίνητο που του εχετε κλείσει, στέλνοντας του φωτογραφίες με screenshot αυτα που μπορεί να μην του ταιριάζουν ούτως ώστε να ειναι και αυτος σύμφωνος οτι το κατάλυμα κάλυπτει τις αναγκες του.

Τελος ευχομαι σε ολους υγεια να ειστε ολοι μα ΟΛΟΙ καλα και να χαμογελάτε για να κανετε τους αλλους να ανησυχούν !

I want to tell you please don't  send me numbers before confirmed booking  because I don't get them.
Observation N 2:

Observation N 3:
When you ask me for a lower price please do not overdo it.

Observation N 4:
I am always trying to provide as much information as possible about the location of the apartment and with which means of transport it is serviced and which ones are, and I beg you don't  send me messages about where the house is or how much time from the meter etc. See all the photos better and read the captions for each apartment.
Observation N 5: 
If you make a reservation on behalf of a third party, make sure that it has received all the necessary information for the property you have closed, by sending the photos with  screenshots that may not match it so that it is also in agreement that the property is covered his needs.

Finally, I wish to all of you to be healthy to be ALL ALL good and to smile to make others worry!

I was inspired by the idea of going into a luxury hotel and looking at its reception. I said this I want to do in my life what I had a vision of as a child. To highlight Greek Hospitality to our guests.

So I decided to create a hosting and management company of every kind of accommodation that would act as the host of the most successful 5-star hotel. When a customer goes to a hotel reception he can ask information about a room until what he wants about his accommodation in or out of it. Also, the reception and reservations are essentially all over the hotel.

So we set up a company that manages any kind of accommodation from apartments to villas and hotels to hotel-level quality with a hotel reception in mind.

We provide sales management, top-notch cleaning, reception, arrival and departure services, professional photography, insurance, solutions for any property owner who wants to use it for our Tourism, according to his needs.

At the same time, we give the visitor the opportunity to organize so much of his journey with transfers, excursions, car rentals, restaurants, airline tickets and anything else that every visitor wants so that we can organize Greek Hospitality and stay according to its needs and wills.

Everything about quality is quality. From accommodation to every possible external partner to work with 100% quality hosting because we want to advertise our Greece above all.

We started with 2 accommodations in Markopoulo Oropou and Heraklion Attica.

Having several suggestions from the 1st year we chose the quality we didn't do any other collaborations because we are interested in quality first and then quantity.

This also brought us the first international distinctions from international tourism giants.

We have now reached 6 having 4 extra accommodations in Kerameikos, Tinos, Aigaleo, Ampelokipoi.

By the beginning of next year, we will reach 10 without exceeding them until putting our next goals.

Our partnerships include leading companies in every industry as well as hotels throughout Greece. 

We expect you to experience the true Greek Hospitality experience at one of our accommodations.
We are a newly wedded couple. We both grew up in Athens and we want to welcome you in Athens and have an enjoyable stay.

We have made our apartment available on Airbnb for travelers who wish to visit Athens for a shorter or longer period. The apartment is in central Athens, Exarcheia district, in a lively neighborhood but the apartment itself is quiet as it is overlooking an inner courtyard. Σε κεντρική τοποθεσία στον πεζόδρομο της οδού Αποστόλου Παύλου, το Phidias Hotel απέχει μόλις 250μ. από την Ακρόπολη και 100μ. από το σταθμό Θησείο του Μετρό. Διαθέτει μπαρ και προσφέρει κλιματιζόμενα δωμάτια με δωρεάν Wi-Fi.

Τα δωμάτια του Phidias είναι εξοπλισμένα με δορυφορική τηλεόραση, σίδερο και στεγνωτήρα μαλλιών. Όλα τα δωμάτια έχουν ιδιωτικό μπάνιο με ντους.
Δύο απο τα τέσσερα δωμάτια που προσφέρουμε βρίσκονται στο υπόγειο χωρίς παράθυρο και τα άλλα δύο προσφέρουν παράθυρο. Δείτε τις καταχωρήσεις μας για να δείτε ποιο δωμάτιο ταιριάζει στις ανάγκες σας! 

Το Phidias διαθέτει lounge, όπου οι επισκέπτες μπορούν να απολαύσουν καφέ και ποτά από το μπαρ. Καθημερινά σερβίρεται ευρωπαϊκό πρωινό (με έξτρα χρέωση) και υπάρχει 24ωρη υπηρεσία δωματίου.

Τα κατοικίδια επιτρέπονται κατόπιν αιτήματος και υπάρχει επιπλέον χρέωση για την οποία ενημερώνεστε στο check-in σας.

Ο σιδηροδρομικός σταθμός του Θησείου απέχει 150μ. από το ξενοδοχείο, ενώ η Αρχαία Αγορά είναι 100μ. μακριά. Κοντά στις εγκαταστάσεις θα βρείτε δωρεάν χώρο στάθμευσης.

..............................................................................................................................................................

Centrally located on the pedestrian street of Apostolou Pavlou Street, Phidias Hotel is just 250 meters away. from the Acropolis and 100m. from Thiseio Metro station. It has a bar and offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Phidias are equipped with satellite TV, an iron and a hairdryer. All rooms have a private bathroom with shower.
Two of the four rooms we offer are located in the basement without a window and the other two offer a window. See our listings to see which room suits your needs!

Phidias has a lounge, where guests can enjoy coffee and drinks from the bar. A continental breakfast is served daily (extra charge) and there is 24-hour room service.

Pets are allowed upon request and there is an additional charge. For the cost you will be informed on your check-in.

Thiseio Train Station is 150 meters away. from the hotel, while the Ancient Agora is 100m. far away. Free parking is available near the premises.

Hi! It is Tasos and Christos! We are the founders of Ecohub! 
We believe that our existence on this beautiful planet is not for granted. We live and act upon this earth with ethos, filotimo and meraki, Greek words that represent who we are. We feel responsible over our home, earth, our family and people all around the world. After all, earth is what we all have in common. This is why we feel the urge to protect her. We respect and value what is generously given to us, we consider everyday a new opportunity, a gift.  
So we choose to act, because we have the power, united, to make a big impact by making the right choices. Not by duty but because this is who we are, this is our lifestyle.
Thus, we collaborate with individuals and companies that create only ethically made products. Products that come from earth without taking advantage of her. Products with ethos made by people with filotimo and meraki. People we choose carefully to bring together, to become a big family, a big Eco Hub to make a big impact we will all be proud of.   
Ecoflat represents our philosophy on how hospitality should look like, combining sustainability together with the Greek traditional hospitality.

Shila is an ethereal late 1920s residence in the heart of Athens, which brings new meaning and inspiration to the concept of the boutique hotel.  A place to feel indulged and at home, and yet at the same time, to experience an otherworldly realm of elegance and sensuality. 

Combining elements of the bygone and the contemporary– and reminiscent of a hotel particulier – this neoclassical house comprises of six distinctively designed suites, each unique in character, with a unifying element of simplicity and sexy charm.

Shila features a lush courtyard, a tranquil rooftop, lounging areas and reading nooks, ideally suited for social gatherings, art happenings and private events.  We offer the ultimate curated experience in culinary, art, design, and indulgent self-care. An invitation to experience our intuitive hospitality, where Shila stands as a magnetic universe of its own.

Έχω σπουδάσει οικονομικά με μεταπτυχιακό ΜΒΑ . Μένω στην  Αθήνα και μου αρέσουν τα ταξίδια , το διάβασμα, η κηπουρική, η γυμναστική, ο χορός και η θάλασσα. Μου αρέσει να γνωρίζω νέα άτομα, πολιτισμούς και μέρη.  Θα χαρώ να σας φιλοξενήσω στο χώρο μου και να κάνω τη διαμονή σας όσο το δυνατόν πιο ευχάριστη.

Είμαι η Σοφία. Έχω σπουδάσει υποκριτική. Δουλεύω στο θέατρο ως σκηνοθέτης και έχω τον δικό μου θίασο με κούκλες.  Αγαπώ τον τόπο καταγωγής μου το Ληξούρι Κεφαλονιάς. Έτσι αναπαλαίωσα το σπίτι του παππού και της γιαγιάς μου , όπου έχω παιδικές όμορφες αναμνήσεις  και είμαι έτοιμη να σας φιλοξενήσω  με χαρά. Το σπίτι αυτό ήταν πάντα πολύ φιλόξενο  και με θετική ενέργεια. Στο Ληξούρι δημιουργώ τις δικές μου παραστάσεις που  θα ήταν τιμή μου αν βρεθείτε εδώ να  είστε θεατές. Η ευχαρίστηση μου όταν είμαι εδώ είναι η βόλτα με το ποδήλατο και η μεσημεριανή βουτιά  στην κοντινότερη παραλία. Αγαπώ τον υγιεινό τρόπο διατροφής και εδώ μπορώ να βρώ βιολογικά ντόπια προϊόντα και το φρέσκο ψαράκι που προμηθεύομαι κατευθείαν από τους συμπαθέστατους ψαράδες του τόπου. Μου αρέσει  η  ελληνική  έντεχνη μουσική, οι καντάδες ένα είδος επτανησιακής ερωτικής μουσικής,  τα ρεμπέτικα τραγούδια , τραγουδώ και εγώ καμιά φορά,  και η κλασική μουσική. Χορεύω παραδοσιακούς χορούς σε έναν σύλλογο της Κεφαλονιάς. Εδω στην Αθηνα διατηρω το σπιτι της μαμας με κλασικα επιπλα που αναπαλαιωνω με αγαπη και θα χαρω να σας φιλοξενησω. Μου αρέσει να ταξιδεύω και εγώ σε καινούριους προορισμούς και να γνωρίζω   άλλους πολιτισμούς και ανθρώπους. Αγαπώ τα ζώα και τα παιδιά και όπου μπορώ τα βοηθώ. Έτσι κι αλλιώς η ζωή είναι ωραία.
